title: 1 Tholi Lidza Phalaphala
content:
# 1 Tholi Lidza Phalaphala

 1. Tholi lidza phalaphala, vhathu kha vha kaidzwe;Vhane vha pfa mafhungo, vha rembuluwe vha tshile.
CHORUStholi lidza phalaphala, lidza i tou pfala;Mudzimu U a u ruma, uri vha tshile vhothe.
2. Lidza i pfiwe nga vhothe, u ime na kha thavha,Vhidzelela na kha malwanzhe, mafhungo a vhutshilo.
3. Kha i pfale dzindevheni, dza kha vha re swiswini;I ri zwothe zwo lugiswa, khotsi o ri lindela.
4. Vhudza vhane vha lemelwa, vhane vha lila Yesu;Murena u khou vhidza, Ida zwino u tshile.

title: 2 Murena U A da
content:
# 2 Murena U A da

 1. Murena U munangoni, we a hwala tshifhambano;Vhothe avho vha u luga, vha do kuvhanganywa.
CHORUSU tsini, na munango, Murena U tsini na munango;U a da, U a da o swika munangoni.
2. Zwithu zwothe zwi sumbedza, u da ha Yesu hu tsini; Ri do vhona madautsha, a duvha lihulu
3. Sedzani zwa shangoni, phusu-phusu a dzi fheli;Musi Yesu a tshi vhuya, u do dzi fhelisa
4. Henengei shangoni liswa, ri do dzula ri vhakhethwa;Hu si tshe na vha no do fa, nga hu sa fheliho.

title: 3 U vhonana Zwifhatuwo
content:
# 3 U vhonana Zwifhatuwo

 1. Mato a do di Mu vhona, Yesu a tshi do vhuya   U do di da nda Mu vhona, Yesu o ri felaho
CHORUS   Mato a do di Mu vhona, Yesu a tshi do vhuya    Mato a do di Mu vhona, ndi Ene Yesu ngoho.
2. Afha huna tsho tsiraho, tsho tsiraho nga ngoho;li a da duvha lavhudi, ri do mu vhona Yesu;
3. Ndi takala u mu vhona, zwililo zwi tshi fhela;Zwothe zwi sa divhiwiho, zwi do diswa tshedzani.
4. Mato a do di Mu vhona, Ene Mutshidzi wanga Ndi do vhonana na Yesu, Yesu Mutshidzi wanga.

title: 4 U a da
content:
# 4 U a da

 1. A’difha mafhungo ndevheni ya mudali, e kule-kule na hayaniHu tsini-tsini-ha u vhuya ha Murena, na muvhuso U a da nawo.
CHORUSU a da, U a da nga u tavhanya, U a da fhano shangoni;Vhatshimbili vha do dzhena hayani, musi Yesu a tshi vhuya.
2. Vho faho kale-kale vho lala zwaloni, vha do vuwa zwaloni zwavho;Vhothe vhare lwanzheni lu re na maanda, vha do vhu wana vhutshilo.
3. Ri do di tangana ngei shangoni liswa, ri tshi do imba ro takala;Vhane vha bva kule na kha mashango othe, ri do rabela Mudzimu
4. Haleluya Amen Haleluya Amen, ri do swika nga u tavhanya; Fhatuwa u fulufhele Murena khotsi, U a da Murena na khare.

title: 5 Hayani Hu Tshe Kule?
content:
# 5 Hayani Hu Tshe Kule?

 1. Hu tshee kule naa hayani? Ndi vhudzisa Mune wanga,A ri ’vhusiku ho fhela, hu da madautshaZwino u songo tsha lila, kondelela ,da ri tuwe, Ro swika zwino tshedzani, tshe tshi sa fheliho.
2. Nda vhudzisa nduna ya andwa, khei phindulo ya hone,"Ndi do lwa nda kondelela, nga pfumo la tshedza;Zwino u songo tsha lila, I ya hone nga vhulenda,Mukovhe u do u wana, musi wo no kunda.’
3. Ndo sedzisa kha zwifhinga, zwi sumba uri ri tsini"Na u vhuya ha Murena, hu do fhela shango;Zwino u songo tsha lila, dzitsumbedzo dzi ya anda,Dzi ri vhudza uri Yesu, u tsini-tsini ha."
4. Hayani a hu tshe kule, ndi muhumbulo wavhudi"Mutshimbili kondelela, fhumula zwililo;Zwino u songo tsha lila, ngauri ri do tangana,Dzitshengelo dzo no fhela, hayani tadulu.’

title: 6 Sedzesani Vhakhethwa.
content:
# 6 Sedzesani Vhakhethwa.

 1. Sedzesani talifhani, vhonani-ha dzitsumbedzo;Penyisani-ha dzimbone, ngauri Yesu U a da.
CHORUSU a da! Yesu U a da! U a da! U da nga thendo!U a da u vhusa vhothe, U a da, Ee, U a da
2. Fulufhedziso la Yesu; Tshilidzi tshi sa fheliho;Malofha a re kha nguvho, a sumba mushumo watsho.
3. Mivhuso yo balangana, ipfani thikho dzi tshi wa;Vha vhudzeni zwa tshilidzi, phala-phala i do lila.
4. Mashango ha na mulalo, u da ha Yesu hu tsini;Hu vho do fhedzwa lifhasi, musi Yesu a tshi vhuya.
5. Vhavhi ,pfani ni a vhidzwa, Khotsi U tshe O lindela;tavhanyani hu do valwa, a sathu u ri: "Ho valwa."

title: 7 Musi A Tshi Vhuya
content:
# 7 Musi A Tshi Vhuya

 1. Musi a tshi vhuya U do dzhia vhathu vhaweVhathu vhawe vha do penya vhunga sa Ene
CHORUSKhare dzi do penya sa naledzi tadulu; Vhothe vha do penya sa vhakhethwa vhawe
2. A vha dzhia, A vha dzhia, vha thubwa nga Ene;Vho lugaho vha do penya, nga misi yothe.
3.Na vhana vha re vhatuku, vha funa Murena Ndi vhakhethwa vha Yehova, Muvhumbi washu.

title: 8 Phalaphala I tshi Lila
content:
# 8 Phalaphala I tshi Lila

 1. Phala-phala I tshi lila tshifhinga tsho no fhela,Hu do swika duvha lo ambiwaAvho vho tshidzwaho vha kuvhanganyelwa tadulu,Vha vhidzwa tadulu ndi do vha hone.
CHORUSVha tshi do vhidzwa tadulu, Vha tshi do vhidzwa taduluVha tshi do vhidzwa tatulu vha vhidzwa tadulu ndi do vha hone. 
2. Ilo duvha ndi lavhudi, vha tshi do vuswa vhotheVha do vha vhe vhaswa vhukuma vhothe;Avho vho nangwaho vha kuvhanganyelwa hayaniVha vhidzwa tadulu ndi do vha hone.
3. Kha ri shumele Murena u swika A tshi vhuya,Kha ri divhadzane lufuno lwawe;Ro no fa a ri tsha do kona u shuma na tshithuVha vhidzwa tadulu ndi do vha hone.

title: 9 Yesu U A da Hafhu
content:
# 9 Yesu U A da Hafhu 

 1. Kha ri lidze-ha phalaphala-vho, Yesu u a da hafhuKhwatha mudali vhidzelelani, Yesu u a da hafhu. 
CHORUSU a da hafhu! U a da hafhu! Yesu u a da hafhu. 
2. Huwelelani na dzithavhani, Yesu u a da hafhu;Ngwana yo no vha tsini vhukuma, Yesu u a da hafhu. 3. Lwanzhe lu ambe nga magabelo, Yesu u a da hafhu;Lu thudze khunzikhunzini lu ri, Yesu u a da hafhu.  4. U fhihamelwa ha shango hu ri, Yesu u a da hafhu;Muya na madumbu zwa bvumela, Yesu u a da hafhu. 5. U sinyuwa ha dzitshakha hu ri, Yesu u a da hafhu;Ndivho yo no dala lwa u dala, Yesu u a da hafhu.
3. Lwanzhe lu ambe nga magabelo, Yesu u a da hafhu;Lu thudze khunzikhunzini lu ri, Yesu u a da hafhu. 
4. U fhihamelwa ha shango hu ri, Yesu u a da hafhu;Muya na madumbu zwa bvumela, Yesu u a da hafhu. 
5. U sinyuwa ha dzitshakha hu ri, Yesu u a da hafhu;Ndivho yo no dala lwa u dala, Yesu u a da hafhu.

title: 10 Ri tangana Mulamboni
content:
# 10 Ri tangana Mulamboni

  1. Ri tangana mulamboni, hu na tshedza tshavhudi;Madi awo ndi avhudi, a bva kha khulunoni.
CHORUSRi tangana mulamboni, kha wavhudi kha wavhudi tshotheRo tangana na vhakhethwa, khulunoni ya Mudzimu 
2. Tsini na uyo mulambo, ri do lumelisana;Ri tshi renda Mudzimu, ro di takala nga misi
3. Mulamboni u penyaho, hu rulwaho mihwalo;Ro no tshidzwa nga tshilidzi, ra tanganedza khare
4. Mulamboni u penyaho, mathupho o no fhela;Mbilu dzashu dzo takala, nga vhulenda vhuhulu.

title: 11 Ndi do U Tevhela
content:
# 11 Ndi do U Tevhela 

 1. Ndi do u tevhela Yesu, Hothe hune wa nnyisa;Hune wa ya ndi do ya-vho, Murena ndi do di ya.
CHORUSNdi do u tevhela Yesu, Wo fhaladza malofha;Na musi u tshi nyadziwa, Ndi do di U tevhela 
2. Naho ndila i na mipfa, Na musi hu madini;Ndi do gwadama nga misi, Nda do di U tevhela.3 Naho mathupho e manzhi, Ndi tshi lingwa nga hothe;Ndila i dihwa nga iwe, Ndi do di U tevhela4. Ndededze ndi matunguni, Naho ndi kha vhushai;Iwe wo lingwa nga zwothe, Ndi do di U tevhela.5. Arali U nga ntutshela, Ndi do sala ndi ndothe;Nda si divhe hune nda ya, Ndi funa U tevhela
3 Naho mathupho e manzhi, Ndi tshi lingwa nga hothe;Ndila i dihwa nga iwe, Ndi do di U tevhela
4. Ndededze ndi matunguni, Naho ndi kha vhushai;Iwe wo lingwa nga zwothe, Ndi do di U tevhela.
5. Arali U nga ntutshela, Ndi do sala ndi ndothe;Nda si divhe hune nda ya, Ndi funa U tevhela

title: 12 Hu Na Tshisima
content:
# 12 Hu Na Tshisima

 1. Hu na tshisima tshi bvaho, Ha Yesu Murena;Vhatshinyi vhe vha tamba vho, Hone malofhani,Vhothe vha do bviswa vhutshinyini havho,Vhatshinyi vho tanzwiwaho, Hona malofhani.
2. Mutshinyi we a vhambwa, A takala u vhona;Mune wa tshone tshisima, A mu tanzwa zwivhi,Nangwe ndi na zwivhi, Ndi do di tanzwiwa, Mune wa tshone tshisima, A mu tanzwa zwivhi.
3. Rine rothe ri livhuwa, Ngwana yo ri fela;Shango lothe li nga tshidzwa, nga yone zwivhini,Malofha a maanda, A u tanzwa vhutshinyi,Shango lothe li nga tshidzwa, nga yone zwivhini.
4. Tshe nda vhona Iwe Yesu, wo felaho rine;Lufuno lwau lu kha nne, U swika lufuni,U swika U tshi da, U swika U tshi da,Lufuno lwau lu kha nne, U swika lufuni.
5. Yesu U nndugisele-vho, vhudzulo tadulu;Nangwe zwi songo mpfanela, Iwe wo no mpfela,Wo mpfulufhedzisa, Na vhutshilo vhuswa,Nangwe zwi songo mpfanela, Iwe wo no mpfela.
6. Ndi na luimbo lwavhudi, Ndi renda u tshidzwa;Nga maanda awe Murena, Ndo tanzwiwa zwivhi,Ndi nga we a lovha, A vuwa vhafuni,Nga maanda awe Murena, Ndo tanzwiwa zwivhi.

title: 13 Ndi Tshene Sa Mahada
content:
# 13 Ndi Tshene Sa Mahada

 1. Murena kha ndi vhe o fhelelaho;Ndi tama uri U dzule na nne;U bvise yothe midzimu i sili;U ntanzwe-vho ndi tshene sa Mahada.
CHORUSSa Mahada, sa Mahada-vho!ntanzwe-vho ndi tshene sa Mahada. 
2. Yesu ntsedze U ngeyo tadulu;Nthuse ndi vhe tshithavhelo Tshau;Ndi a dinekedza tshothe-tshothe-vho;ntanzwe-vho ndi tshene sa Mahada.
3. Yesu ndi a di nyadza ndi humbela;Ndo gwadama nayoni dza Murena;Zwino ndi di nekedza  tshothe-tshothe-vho;ntanzwe-vho ndi tshene sa Mahada.
4. Yesu ndo U lindela nga vhulenda;Ida U ntsikele mbilu ntswa;Ngauri a funaho a U mu hani;ntanzwe-vho ndi tshene sa Mahada.

title: 14 Thetshelesa Mali I tshi Wa
content:
# 14 Thetshelesa Mali I tshi Wa

 1. Ipfa mali tshi wa, thetshelesa-ha;Ndi ya Yesu yothe, i ya kha Ene.
CHORUSNgwinzhi, ngwinzhi, ngwinzhi, ngwinzhi, ipfa i ya wa!Ndi ya Yesu yothe, i ya kha Ene.
2. Ngwinzhi, ngwinzhi, kheyo ndi mutendelo;Tshifhiwa tsha Yesu, kha vhana vhawe.
3. Naho ri vhatuku, kha ri bvise-vho;U nga vhahulwane, vha nekedzaho.
4. Naho ri vhashai, ri a mu funa;U do di takala, nga u mwemwela.

title: 15 Yesu U A Mpfuna
content:
# 15 Yesu U A Mpfuna

 1, Yesu U a mpfuna, na Bivhili i ralo;Vhana ndi vha Murena, Maanda avho ndi Ene.
CHORUSYesu ya pfuna, U a pfuna nne;Yesu ya pfuna, I ralo Bivhili.
2, Yesu U a mpfuna, ndi Ene O ’pfelaho;Muvula litadulu, ntanzwe zwivhini zwanga.
3. Yesu U a mpfuna, naho ndi mulwadze-vho;Musi ndi matunguni, U ilafha nne-vho.
4. Yesu U a mpfuna, arali nda mu funa;U da hawe hu tsini, A da a dzhia nne.

title: 16 Ndo tanzwa Zwanda
content:
# 16 Ndo tanzwa Zwanda

 1. Zwanda khezwi khezwi,Ndo zwi tanzwa zwa tshena;Ndi nekedza Yesu.
CHORUSNa milenzhe yanga, nga i thanyele,Hune ya ya hone, i ye ha Yesu.
2. Na ndevhe nga dzi pfe,Na nga maduvha othe;Mishumo yavhudi,Ine nda nga ita-vho.
3. Mato nga a sedze,Hothe hune nda ya-vho;Uri ndi si tshine,Nda do khakhela Yesu.

title: 17 Ndi Lufuno Lu Ri Takadzaho
content:
# 17 Ndi Lufuno Lu Ri Takadzaho

 1. Nga lufuno lwa Yesu ri pfa ro takala,Ri kona u kondelela na kha vhanwe vhathu.
CHORUSMudzimu U ri funa rothe, ri tama u fana nae,Nga lufuno lwa Yesu, ri pfa ro takala;Ri kona u kondelela na kha vhanwe vhathu.
3. Vhufheloni ha zwothe, hu do swika Yesu;Ri do imba luimbo, lwa vhothe vho kundaho.

title: 18 Phanda Vhakreste
content:
# 18 Phanda Vhakreste

 1. Tshivhidzo tsha Yesu mafumo ngeya,Ri ye-vho nndwani, ri lwe na swina,Nduna ya mmbi, ndi Ene Yesu vho;Ndi Muvhusa vhothe, U da na gundo.
CHORUSI yani-ha phanda,Inwi maswole,Murena Asuyu,A ri lwelaho.
2. Vhonani vhahashu, Mbilu ya muvhi,I a tetemela, i ofha Yesu,Ipfi lo ambiwa, ndi la u kunda;Kha ri khwathe rothe, imbani nothe.
3. Ri tshimbile sa ’mbi, inwi vha Yesu,Kha ri vha edzise vho no kundaho,Ri si balangane, khosi ndi ’thihi.Lutendo luthihi lu re kha Yesu.
4. Mahosi a shango, a lovha othe,Tshivhidzo tsha Yesu tshone a tshi wi,Tshi do di mu kunda, Ene sathane;Kristo E na rine, ri do ofhani?
5. I da ri tangane, ri vhe vhathihi,Sa tshivhidzo tshawe, ri imbe rothe,Ri khode Murena maduvha othe,Na vharunwa vhothe ri imbe rothe.

title: 19 Dzula Wo dilinda
content:
# 19 Dzula Wo dilinda

 1. Iwe muya wanga,Dzula wo dilinda;Mudzimu ndi thavha yangaMusi ndo no neta.
2. Dzula nga thabelo,U vhe mulaifa;Yesu U ’tsumbedze ngoho,Na vhutshilo vhuswa.
3. Ilwa na mulingi,U ’tsumbedze Yesu;Fhuluta mitodzi yanga,Ndi sendze litadulu.

title: 20 Vuwa Muya Wanga
content:
# 20 Vuwa Muya Wanga

 1. Vuwa khuthalela Yesu, shuma iya phanda;Vha ralo-vho makoleni, khuthalela khare.
2. Ili ipfi ndi la Yesu, li vhidzelelaho;Ndi a nea malamba, kha vho khuthalaho.
3. Ndi vhanzhi vhare dzithanzi, Vha U tanzilela;Litsha dzindila dza fhano, Lilala tadulu.
4. Ri do dzheniswa nga Yesu, Wa dzothe dzitshakha;Ri do vhea phanda hawe, malamba ashu-vho

title: 21 Ndi da Tshifhambanoni
content:
# 21 Ndi da Tshifhambanoni

 1. Ndi da tshifhambanoni, ndi da nga u pofulaZwothe ndi a zwi sanda,Kha Iwe ndi vhutshilo.
CHORUSNdo fulufhela Yesu, Ngwana ya Khalivari;Yesu U amba na nne, ’ndi do u tanzwa tshothe.’
3. Ndi di nekedza  tshothe, lupfumoni na khonani;Mbilu yanga na muya, zwothe nga hu sa fheli.
4. Yesu U amba hafhu,U do ’nyita mukhethwa;Ndi do vha o tshilaho,thendo ndi ya Murena.

title: 22 Murena Ndi Pfa Phathutshedzo
content:
# 22 Murena Ndi Pfa Phathutshedzo

 1. Murena ndi pfa phathutshedzo, U tshi dzi shulula;Phathutshedzo kha dzi dale if, uri ndi vhe mukhethwa,Kha dzi de, kha dzi de, phathutshedzo kha dzi de.
2. ’Si mphire khotsi-anga, u songo tsha mphira na nne;Ndi na zwivhi zwi mbiluni, zwino ndi da kha Iwe,Kha Iwe, kha Iwe, zwino ndi da kha Iwe.
3. ’Si mphire khotsi-anga, U songo nndata Murena.Ndo lindela U tshi ’mbidza, uri ndi de kha Iwe,Ndi do da, ndi do da,U tshi mmbidza ndi doda.
4. Ndi tama muya waU Khotsi, U ’ndalele na nne.A thi vhoni, ndo pofula, amba ipfi ndi vhone,Amba-vho, amba-vho, amba ipfi ndi vhone.
5. Ndo vhona lufuno lwau, nga malofha a Yesu.Phathutshedzo kha dzi ande, uri ndi vhe mukhethwa,Mukhethwa, mukhethwa, uri ndi vhe mukhethwa.

title: 23 Nndadze Zwino Muya Mukhethwa.
content:
# 23 Nndadze Zwino Muya Mukhethwa.

 1. Ndadze zwino Mutshidzi, nga Muya Wau Mukhethwa,Khonani yashu Mufeli, Ida dzhena U dzule.
CHORUSO Muya, Mukhethwa, ro u lindela rine’da kha rine U ri dadze, ’da U dzule kha rine.
2. Ndi’we U zwi divhaho, U konaho U ndolisa,A u shayaho ndi nne, Ida U dzule kha rine
3. A shayaho nungo ndi nne, ndi khotha phanda Hau,Ndi Iwe a re na Maanda, ndadze nga Muya Wau.
4. Fhembeledza mbilu yanga, Yo neta nga mihwalo,Mufhembeledzi Mutshidzi, Ida-ha U ndolise.

title: 24 Ndi U toda Tshothe
content:
# 24 Ndi U toda Tshothe

 1. Ndi U toda tshothe, Yesu wanga,A nthusaho haho, nga mulalo.
CHORUSnne nga zwifhinga zwothe, ndi toda Murena,Ndi de ndi fhatutshedzwe, Ndi da kha’we
2. Ndi U toda tshothe, dzula na nne,Milingo a i di ndi na Iwe.
3. Ndi U toda tshothe, matunguni,Ida-ha U nthuse, ndi sa do fa.
4. Ndi U toda tshothe, mpfunze ndila,Phetha-ha zwe Wa mpfulufhedzisa.
5. Ndi U toda tshothe, Mukhethwa-Mukhethwa,Nyite Wau tshothe, U Mutshidzi.

title: 25 Ndi nekedza Zwothe Yesu
content:
# 25 Ndi nekedza Zwothe Yesu

 1. Ndi nekedza zwothe Yesu, ndi zwi nekedza Iwe,Ndi tshi fulufhela Iwe, ndi do shuma na Iwe.
CHORUSNdi a nekedza, ndi a nekedza,Zwothe ndi do zwi sia ha Iwe Murena.
2. Ndi nekedza zwothe Yesu, phanda hau ndo khotha,Zwa shangoni ndo zwi lata, ntanganedze Murena.
3. Ndi isa zwothe ha Yesu, nnyite-vho Mukhethwa nne,,Mphe-vho Muya Mukhethwa, u vhe wanga vhukuma.
4. Ndi nekedza zwothe Yesu, ndi pfa mulalo Wau,Ndi takalela u tshidzwa, ndi do renda Murena.

title: 26 Ndi da Ndo di rali Khotsi
content:
# 26 Ndi da Ndo di rali Khotsi

 1. Ndi da ndo di rali khotsi, ipfi ndi nalo lithihi,la u ri Iwe wo mpfela, ndi a da kha Iwe Nngwana.
2. Ndi da ndo di rali khotsi, a thi koni u di tanzwa,Ndi tamba nga malofha au, ndi a da kha Iwe Nngwana.
3. Ndi da ndo di rali khotsi, u ntsikele luvalo.Uri lu vhe lu ndindaho, ndi a da kha Iwe Nngwana.
4. Ndi da ndo di rali khotsi, ndo disa tshikha ya zwivhi,Ndi muhedana muyani, ndi a da kha Iwe Nngwana.
5. Ndi da ndo di rali khotsi, ndi ri ntanzwe mbilu yanga,Ndi tenda fulufhedziso, ndi a da kha Iwe Nngwana.
6. Ndi da ndo di rali khotsi, Mbofhe nga lufuno lwau,Ndi itwe Wau Murena, ndi a da kha Iwe Nngwana.

title: 27 Ri Renda Khotsi
content:
# 27 Ri Renda Khotsi

 1. Ri renda Khotsi nga Murwa wawe-vho,Nga Yesu we a fela-vho na rine.
CHORUSHaleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya, Amen.Haleluya, Haleluya, Ri vusuluswe
2. Ri renda Khotsi, nga Muya waWe,We a ri vhonisa Mutshidzi washu.
3. Dzithendo dzothe, kha yone Ngwana-vho,Ye ya hwala zwivhi zwothe zwa shango.
4. Ri fhembeledzwa nga lufuno lwawe,Vhutshilo hashu vhu vusuluswe-vho.
5. Khuliso yothe na dzithendo dzothe,Kha Uyo we a ri rengulula-vho.

title: 28 di nee Tshifhinga Tsha U Vha Mukhethwa.
content:
# 28 di nee Tshifhinga Tsha U Vha Mukhethwa.

 1. Di-nee tshifhinga tsha u do amba,Dzula na Murena u ambe nae,Ita vhukonani, thusa vhahota,Phathutshedzo dzawe u si dzi hangwe.
2. Di-ite Mukhethwa na mushumoni,di-nee tshifhinga tsha u rabela,Nga u sedza Yesu U mu edzise,Hu vhonale Ene fhedzi kha Iwe.
3. Di-ite Mukhethwa u Mu tevhele,Hothe hu ne wa ya O ranga phanda,Musi wa dakalo kana zwililo,Khwathisa kha Yesu pfa ipfi lawe.
4. Di-ite Mukhethwa mbilu i rule,U do u dededza nga zwa tadulu,Na muya Mukhethwa wo ranga phanda,U u lugisela kha zwa tadulu.

title: 29 Dzula Na Nne
content:
# 29 Dzula Na Nne

 1. Dzula na nne hu da madekwana,Li a swifhala ’da dzula na nne,Musi vhanwe vha tshi furalela,Iwe Mutshidzi ’da dzula na nne.
2. Vhu tavhanya u fhira vhutshilo,U naka ha zwa shango hu ngafhi,Zwithu zwothe zwi a thuthekana,A sa shandukiho dzula na nne.
3. Ndi a u humbela u dzule na nne,U siho milingo i do nkunda,U songo da sa mufhiri kha nne,Hone Murena u dzule na nne.
4. Hu todea U tshi dzula nne,Mulingi u a kundwa nga Iwe,Ndi nnyi ane a nga Iwe Yesu,maduvha othe ’da dzula na nne.
5. A thi ofhi musi ndi na Iwe,6. Mitodzi a i tshe na vhutungu,Lufu na tshidza zwi nga nnyitani?Ndi na gundo musi ndi na Iwe.

title: 30 duvha li Kovhela Vhukovhela
content:
# 30 duvha li Kovhela Vhukovhela

 1. duvha li a kovhela, zwino hu da swiswi,Lindani nga thabelo, musi swiswi lo no tibedza shango.
CHORUSU Mukhethwa-khethwa, O! Jehova!Vha tadulu na fhasi, nga vha Mu rende Ene RaMaanda.
2. Ndi Mune wa vhutshilo, a dzulaho tadulu,’da U ri kuvhatedze, ri ye muvhusoni Wau u daho.
3. Swiswi zwino lo no da, ri humbela tshilidzi,naledzi dzi fukedza tshifhatuwo Tshau, ro u tulutshelwa.
4. Musi ri sa tsha vhona, ho sala lone swiswi,Murena wa vharunwa, tshedza Tshau tshi pandela swiswi lothe.

title: 31 U duvha la Muya Wanga
content:
# 31 U duvha la Muya Wanga

 1. U duvha la muya wanga, Ú tsini swiswi a liho.Hu sa de swiswi la dzumba tshifhatuwo Tshau Yesu.
2. Musi ndi tshi vho edela, Mato anga a tshi bonya,Ndi awela ndo takala, ndi na ’We Murena wanga.
3. Matsheloni, madekwana, dzula na nne U ndededze,Musi vhusiku ho swika, Ú sin a nne thi nga tshili.
4. Ndi tshi vuwa mphathutshedze, ndi sathu thoma-vho lwendo,Uri nga lufuno lwau, ndi ye henengei tadulu.

title: 32 Vhushavhelo Nga Tshifhinga Tsha Madumbu.
content:
# 32 Vhushavhelo Nga Tshifhinga Tsha Madumbu.

 1. Murena ndi tombo lashu, na vhushavhelo hashu-vho,Bako na murunzi washu, ndi ’we vhushavhelo hashu.
CHORUSMurango u re na Maanda, Murunzi wa lino shango,Murangaphanda wa ngoho, U vhushavhelo hashu-vho
2. Yesu ndi murunzi washu, U vhushavhelo hashu-vho,A ri ofhi U na rine, U vhushavhelo hashu-vho.
3. Naho hu nga da mudalo, U vhushavhelo hashu-vho,Ri di dzumba kha Mudzimu, U vhushavhelo hashu-vho.
4. Thikho I re tombo lashu, U vhushavhelo hashu-vho,Dzula tshothe Iwe Yesu, U vhushavhelo hashu-vho.

title: 33 O Nthanga Phanda
content:
# 33 O Nthanga Phanda

 1. nthanga phanda Murena, U mphumudza matunguni,Kha zwothe zwine nda ita, tshanda tshawe tshi kha nne.
CHORUSYesu u do di nkokodza, nga Tshawe tshanda tshihulu,Musi a tshi khou nkokodza na nne ndi do di tevhela.
2. Na musi hu tshi da swiswi, naho hu dzikhakhathini,A thi ofhi a thi tshuwi, nga u’ Murena u na nne.
3. A thi nadzo mbilaelo, tshanga ndi u kondelela,Kha zwothe ndi dakaloni, nga u’ Murena U na nne.
4. Musi ndo fhedza mushumo, ndi do vha o takalaho,A thi tsha ofha na lufu, ndi do wela Yorodane.

title: 34 Mulalo U Tshi Nga Mulambo.
content:
# 34 Mulalo U Tshi Nga Mulambo.

 1. Mulalo u nga mulambo muhulu, naho matungu e manzhi,Iwe wo mpfunza wa ri: ’Zwo naka, Zwo naka na kha muya wanga’.
CHORUSZwo naka...Kha muya...wanga, zwo naka muya wanga
2. Musi Sathane a tshi da u nndinga, ha nga zwi koni u nngwana,Ngauri Yesu O nthusa A fhaladza, na malofha Awe nga nne.
3. Arali ndi tshi humbula zwauri, zwothe zwivhi zwe nda ita;O zwi ombela-vho tshifhambanoni, muya u livhuwa Murena.
4. duvha la vhufhelo nga li tavhanye, Makole a do petiwa;A tshi da hu do lila phalaphala, zwo naka na kha muya wanga.

title: 35 Vhukonani Vhu Ngafha
content:
# 35 Vhukonani Vhu Ngafha

 1. Hu na vhukonani kha Murena, ri imiswa zwandani zwawe,Dziphathutshedzo dzone ndi khulu, ndo di-tika zwandani zwawe
CHORUSFara...Khwatha, shavhela khae u tshile,Fara...Khwatha, Ima khae Yesu u kunde
2. Zwo naka ngoho u vha mudali, ndo di-tika zwandani zwawe,Hu na tshedza tshi vhonetshelaho, mudali a vhone Murena.
3. Ndi nga ofhani? Ndi nga ofhani? Zwino ndi khou tsireledzwa,Naho ndi nga fashwa nga milingo, ndi do dzula zwandani zwawe

title: 36 Lutendo Lwanga
content:
# 36 Lutendo Lwanga

 1. Ndi sedza kha Iwe, Ngwana ya Khalivari, U mukhethwa,’Pfa thabelo yanga, thutha zwivhi zwanga,U bva namusi kha ndi vhe Wau
2. Kha ndi newe Maanda, na u kondelela, Nga RaMaanda,Kha ndi u tende-ha, nga ho fhelelaho,Ngauri Iwe wo no di mpfela.
3. Kha vhutungu hothe, ndo no swifhalelwa, U nkokodze,Pandelai swiswi, mphulute mitodzi,Uri ndi si pambuwe ndilani.

title: 37 Tsini Na Mudzimu
content:
# 37 Tsini Na Mudzimu

 1. Tsini na Mudzimu, tsini-tsini, na musi ndo hwala tshifhambano,Luimbo lwanga lu do vha holuno-vho, Tsini na Mudzimu, tsini-tsini.
2. Na musi ndi tshi nga sa mueni, naho ndo siamela kha tombo,Fhedzi ndoro dzanga ndi dzine dza do ri, ndi tsini Mudzimu, tsini-tsini.
3. Kha i penye ndila lwendoni lwanga, zwothe zwe nda fhiwa ndi tshilidzi,Vharunwa tadulu vha do di mbona-vho, ndi tsini Mudzimu, tsini-tsini.
4. Zwi dinaho zwothe zwi tshi ndela, matunguni othe ndi na Iwe,Huno kha mathupho ndi vho do ri nne, Ndi tsini Mudzimu, tsini-tsini.
5. Ndi tshi vho do fhufha nga dziphapha, nda fhira nwedzini na duvhani,Luimbo lwanga-vho lu do vha ulu-vho, ndi tsini Mudzimu, tsini-tsini.

title: 38 Khwathisani Kha Mudzimu
content:
# 38 Khwathisani Kha Mudzimu

 1.Khwathisani kha ipfi la Yesu, na vhukati ha mifhirifhiri,Ndi lone fhedzi lire na Maanda, a u fhenya milingo.
CHORUSKha ri nambatele, ntha ha Murena, ntha ha Kristo fhedzi,Kha ri kondelele, musi ro kunda, ri do dzula na Murena 
2.   Khwathisa u luga, nga zwivhuya, nga mbilu i sa ofhi na tshithu,Ndi lone fhedzi li re na gundo, kha zwivhi zwothe fhano.
3.   Khwathisani khayo ngoho yothe, ndi pfanelo yashu rothe fhano,Ipfi fhedzi li re na mulalo, u swikela vhufhelo.

title: 39 Fulufhelo langa lo Fhatwa Khae
content:
# 39 Fulufhelo langa lo Fhatwa Khae

 1.Fulufhelo langa li kha malofha awe avhudi,Ndi nga si di-fulufhele, ndi tikwa nga dzina lawe.
CHORUSYesu Kristo, thavha yanga, zwinwe zwothe zwi do fhelaZwothe zwinwe zwi do fhela. 
2.   Maswiswi e phanda hanga, ndi di-tika nga tshilidzi,Na madumbu e ndilani, ndi nga si late lutendo.
3.   Ndi mulanga wo khwathaho, kha vho mu fulufhelaho,Naho ndi tshi shaya nungo, Yesu ndo mu fulufhela.
4.   Hu tshi lila phalaphala, ndi do gonya nda ya khae,Ndo ambadzwa ya vhukhethwa, nda sendela khulunoni.

title: 40 Fulufhela U di tukufhadze
content:
# 40 Fulufhela U di tukufhadze

 1. Ri tshi pfa Murena, na ipfi lawe-vho,   U vhonetshela ndila yashu,   Ri tshimbila nae, U dzula na rine,   Na vha pfaho, Vha mu hulisa.
CHORUSThetshelesa, U di-tukufhadze,U fulufhele Yesu, U di-tukufhadze.
2.   A ri nyadzi tshithu, Lufunoni lwawe,Ro di-nekedza tshothe Yesu, Ro funwa nga Iwe,A ri ofhi tshithu, Tshi bvelelaho ri na Iwe.
3.   A huna vhuleme. Naho hu u ofha,Ri wana malamba mahulu. A hu na tshinyalo,Naho e mathupho, nga u pfa ri wana mashudu.
4.   A ri soli tshithu, lufunoni lwawe,Ri tshi vhea zwothe kha Ene, U sumba lufuno,Na lone dakalo, Kha ri mu pfe ri mu hulise.
5.   Musi ri tshi pfana, Ri do tuwa rothe,Yesu u do ri dzhia rothe, Ri do dzula nae,Ra tshimbila nae, Ra tshidzwa nga hu sa fheliho.

title: 41 Mudzimu A Vhe Na Inwi
content:
# 41 Mudzimu A Vhe Na Inwi

 1.Mudzimu a vhe na’nwi nothe, a ni tshimbidze nga ndila,A ni vhiele luhura, ri dovhe ri vhonane hafhu.
CHORUSRi de ri tangane, phanda ha Yesu hafhu,Ri de ri tangane, Mudzimu a vhe na ’nwi nothe.
2.   Mudzimu a vhe na’nwi nothe, ni vhe tshilidzini tshawe,A ni fhe zwiliwa zwawe, ri dovhe ri vhonane hafhu.
3.   Mudzimu a vhe na’nwi nothe, matunguni a milingo,A tou ni kuvhatedza, ri dovhe ri tangane hafhu.
4.   Mudzimu a vhe na’nwi ’nothe, A ni dadze nga lufuno,Ni tsireledzwe kha lufu, Mudzimu a vhe na’’nwi nothe.

title: 42 Ri Tshi tangana Na Vhahashu
content:
# 42 Ri Tshi tangana Na Vhahashu

 1.Ri tshi tangana na vhahashu, hu vha na dakalo,Zwi ro pfisa vhutungu, musi ri tshi vho fhambana.
2.   tadulu a hu fhambanwi, a vha onesani,Ndi kha shango la dakalo, a hu nga fhambanwi.
3.   Ri do takala ri tshi vhona, vhahashu henefho,Fhedzi ri vho lilela, ilo shango la dakalo
4.   Maipfi a no ’Salani.’ Ha tsha do ambiwa,Hu do imbiwa nyimbo, dza vhakhethwa nga dakalo.

title: 43 O Lala E Kha Yesu
content:
# 43 O Lala E Kha Yesu

 1. O lala e kha Murena,Afho hune ha sa lilwe;Vhuawelo ha vhudisa,A huna tshi thithisaho.
2. Ene o lala zwavhudi,O awela o lindela;O tenda a kha di tshila,O fulufhela Mukhethwa.
3. lala kha Yesu tshete,Zwino u vhuaweloni;Mutshidzi a re na Maanda,U do mu vusa nga vhuya.
4. U tshandani tsha Mudzimu,U do vuswa nga Mutshidzi;U do li sia livhIda,Yesu a tshi do mu vusa.

title: 44 Musi Mushumo Wanga Wo No Fhela.
content:
# 44 Musi Mushumo Wanga Wo No Fhela.

 1. Musi mushumo wanga wo fhela fhano fhasi,Muvhili wo ambadzwa u sa sina,Zwenezwo Mutshidzi wanga ndi do mu divhesa,Ene a takala a tshi mmbona.
CHORUSNda mu divha, nda mu divha, ndi do ima tsini-tsini hawe,Nda mu divha, nda mu divha, nga dzintho zwandani zwawe.
2. Ndi do takala ndi tshi vho vhona tshifhatuwo,Na ito lawe li na vhuthu kha nne,Na mbilu yanga i do livhuha nga lufuno,Lwe lwa nndugiselela-vho vhudzulo.
3. rine ri vho do vhona vho faho kale-kale,A ri tsha do dovha ra fhambana-vho,A ri tsha do dovha ra fhambana ngei tadulu,Ndi tama u vhona Murena wanga.
4. Na nne ndi do dzhena mudini nga nguvho tshena,Ndi do vha afho hu sina zwililo,Ndi do imba luimbo lwa vhothe vho tshidzwaho,Musi ndi thsi vhona Mutshidzi wanga.

title: 45 Mphe Bivhili
content:
# 45 Mphe Bivhili

 1.  Mphe Bivhili ya tshedza tsha-vhudi, uri ndi takadze na vhaeni,A hu na gole li tsireledzaho, Kha Yesu a daho u ri tshidza.
CHORUSMphe Bivhili, Murunwa Mukhethwa,Uri na nne i mbonetshele-vho.Fulufhedziso na lufuno lwawe,Zwi dzula zwothe nga hu sa fheli. 
2.  Mphe Bivhili matunguni anga, na musi muya wanga wo neta.Mphe maipfi a ambaho Yesu, Uri ndi vhone Mutshidzi wanga.
3.  Mphe Bivhili i vhonetshelaho, uri ndi vhone khombo dzothe ndilaniNdi denzhe li vhonetshela zwavhudi, uri ndi vhone ndi mu tevhele.
4.  Mphe Bivhili ya tshedza tsha vhudi, tshi do vhonetshela livhIdani,Tshedza tshayo tshi bvaho ngei tadulu, henengei seli ha Yorodane.

title: 46 U Dovhe U Nyimbele ’vho
content:
# 46 U Dovhe U Nyimbele ’vho

 1. U dovhe u nyimbele-vho, maipfi a vhutshilo,Vhudi hao ndi vhu vhone, maipfi a vhutshilo,Ndi maipfi avhudi, a ’funza na nne.
CHORUSMaipfi avhudi-vhudi, a a ri mangadza,Maipfi avhudi-vhudi, a a ri mangadza.
2. Yesu vhanwe o vha nea, maipfi a vhutshilo.Mutshinyi u a vhidzwa-vho, nga ipfi la vhutshilo,U fhiwa nga fhedzi, li isa litadulu.
3. Vhudzani-ha vhathu vhothe, maipfi a vhutshilo,One a disa mulalo, Yesu ndi Mutshidzi,U kona U tanzwa na mbilu dzashu.

title: 47 Seli Na Yorodane
content:
# 47 Seli Na Yorodane

 1. Ndi do ima Yorodane, Nda vhona zwa seli,Ndi sedze shango la-vhudi, lone li re Kanana.
CHORUSRa awela shangoni la-vhudi,seli shangoni la-vhudi-sa,Ri do imba nyimbo dza Mushe naNgwana, ra dzula na Yesu tshothe.
2. Ngei midavhini yavhudi, duvha lo tavha,Yesu ndi tshedza tsha hone, swiswi li do tuswa-vho.
3. Ndi do swika lini hone, ndi fhatutshedzwe-vho,Ndi do vhona lini khotsi, nda dzula vhurenani.
4. Mbilu yanga yo takala, a i tshe ho fhano,Nangwe maswina e manzhi, ndi do kondelela-vho.

title: 48 Vhufheloni Ri do Takala
content:
# 48 Vhufheloni Ri do Takala

 1. Vhufheloni ri do takala, ro kuvhangana hayani,Ri do ya na mitshelo yashu, mudini wa vhudi
CHORUSU takala, U takala, hu sa fheli, u takala,Pembelani duvha li a da, la (u) khurela vhothe.
2. Dzinyimbo dza hone dzo naka, Ri do imba nga dakalo,Ra renda Murena washu mudini ula muswa.
3. Ho lindelwa u do pembela, vhudzulo hone ndi vhunzhi,Ho itwaho nga Murena, mudini ula muswa.

title: 49 Muhumbulo Wavhudi.
content:
# 49 Muhumbulo Wavhudi.

 1. Muhumbulo muswa ngavhe u tshi nndela,Zwino ndo no vha tsini na u swika hayani.
CHORUSNdo no vha tsini na haya,Ndo no vha tsini-tsini zwino u fhira zwa kale.
2. Tsini khotsi-anga na haya ha vhudi,Ndi tsini na khulunoni, henengei tadulu.
3. Tsini na u swika nda rulwa mihwalo,Ndi tshi sia dzikhakhathi, ndi yo wana khare.
4. Vhukati ha swiswi, madumbu vhusiku,Hu mbo taha mulambo u isaho tshedzani.
5. Khotsi, tika lutendo lwanga lu khwathe,’Si nditshe ndi ndothe khunzikhunzini ya lufu.

title: 50 Hu Na Shango La-vhudi
content:
# 50 Hu Na Shango La-vhudi

 1. Hu na shango la-vhudi-vhudi,Ri vho vhona na tshedza tshalo,Khotsi-ashu u henengei,O ri lugisela vhudzulo.
CHORUSHenengei tadulu ....Ri do kuvhangana henengei,Henengei tadulu ....Ri do kuvhangana henengei.
2. Ri do imbelela dzithendo,Nyimbo dza Murena washu-vhoA hu nga do vha na matungu,Khalo shango la u awela.
3. Nga mulandu wa hei mpho,Na dziphathutshedzo dza hone,Ri do imbelela dzithendo,Ha khotsi-ashu wa tadulu.

title: 51 Ri Lovhedze Nga Huswa
content:
# 51 Ri Lovhedze Nga Huswa

 1. Ri lovhedze-ha nga Maanda au,Ri vuse nga lufuno, ri sendedze.
CHORUSRi rabele khotsi ri a humbela,Ri lovhedze nga muya, na lufuno.
2. A ro ngo fanela, ri na tshika,Khotsi, ri tanzwe-ha kha vhuvhi hothe.
3. Muya wau Yesu nga u de ngeno,Ri a U humbela, ima tsini-ha.
4. Nthetshelese, ngeo tadulu,nne ndi a U funa, ndo takala.
5. Ri renda khotsi, ri a U renda,Ngwana yo thavhiwaho, Amen, Amen.

title: 52 Ida Iwe Tshisima
content:
# 52 Ida Iwe Tshisima

 1. ’da tshisima tsha vhutshilo, ndi a U renda Iwe,Ndi lutsinga lwa tshilidzi, lwo fanelaho thendo,Mmpfunze u U hulisa-vho, hu vhoneswe Mudzimu,Mbilu yanga kha i dale, lufuno na dakalo.
2. nne ndi fulufhela Iwe, U tombo li tshidzaho,Ndi fulufhela u tshidzwa, u swikela U tshi da,Ndi Yesu we a ndzhenisa, ngomu sambini lawe,Dzikhomboni nda di tshidzwa, nga malofha a Yesu
3. Ndi na mulandu muhulu, wa tshilidzi tsha Yesu,Mphe-vho u luga hau, ndi vhuyele ha Iwe,Ndi na zwivhi zwinzhi Yesu, ndi di lata kha Iwe,U i dzhie mbilu yanga, i lavhelese Iwe.

title: 53 Muya Mukhethwa Murangaphanda
content:
# 53 Muya Mukhethwa Murangaphanda

 1. Muya u re mukhethwa, ndi kale wo lindela,Nga tshanda tshi todaho, rine vhadali fhano,O netaho a rende, nga ipfi li re lawe,line la ri, ’Mudali ndi do u isa haya’.
2. Iwe thama ya ngoho, haya ho no vha tsini,U si ri sie fhano, vhukuma ri a ofha,Hu tshi bvuma tadulu, nga Iwe ri do khuda,Hevhedza kha nne u ri, ’Ndi do u isa haya’.
3. Khotsi yashu khulwane, ri sumbedze tadulu,U rabela hashu-vho, hone madzina ashu,A hone na tadulu, ipfi li a fhindula,’Mudali Ida-ha, ndi do u isa hayani’.

title: 54 Ndi Tama U Itelwa Tshithihi Nga Murena
content:
# 54 Ndi Tama U Itelwa Tshithihi Nga Murena

 1. Murena ndi ama hetshi, Ndila dzanga dzo vhifhaho;Kha dzi tambe nga madi na mulilo-vho, ntanzwe tshothe.
CHORUSntanzwe nga ngomu hanga, ntanzwe na nga mulilo;Na nga ndila-de, A thi nga hani uri tshivhi tshi fe.
2. Musi ndi tshi vhona tshedza, Ndi takala na muyani;Ndi funa mbilu ntswa-vho, Zwi nakese na kha nne.
3. Musi mbilu yo no tshena, Ndi nga vha na bono fulu;Vhutshilono hanga hu vhe na zwithu zwire zwikhethwa.
4. Ndi linga u bva vhuvhini, Ndi dzule ndo vhofholowa;Ndi linga nga hothe uri ndi kone u vha mukhethwa.

title: 55 Wo Ya Naa Ha Yesu?
content:
# 55 Wo Ya Naa Ha Yesu?

 1. Wo ya naa ha Yesu wo tanzwiwa naa? Wo tamba nga malofha awe?U a fulufhela tshilidzi tshawe, wo tamba nga malofha awe?
CHORUSWo tamba... wo tamba... wo tamba... nga malofha awe?Mbilu yau yo tshenela Yesu naa, wo tamba nga malofha awe?
2. U a tshimbila na Mutshidzi Yesu, Wo tamba nga malofha awe?U awela misi yothe ha Yesu, wo tamba nga malofha awe?
3. U a funa u tshenela Yesu naa? Wo tamba nga malofha awe?Nndu dza hone wo dzi lindela naa, Wo tamba nga malofha awe?
4. Latai-ha nguvho dzi re na tshikha, u a tamba nga malofha awe?Tshi hone tshisima tsho u lindela, Ida malofhani a Ngwana.

title: 56 Ndi A da Hayani
content:
# 56 Ndi A da Hayani

 1. Ndo vha ndo xela ndi kule, zwino ndo vhuya,Ndo neta nga zwivhi zwanga, Yesu ndi a da.
CHORUSNdi a da hayani; ndo no tou neta,Ntanganedze nga lufuno, Yesu ndi a da.
2. Ndo tshinya nga Maanda Yesu, ndi a di-nyadza.Ndi a lila lwa vhutungu, Yesu ndi a da.
3. Ndo neta nga u pambuwa, ndo vhuya hafhu,Ndo fulufhela lufuno, mphe tshilidzi.
4. Mbilu yanga yo lemelwa, ndo neta tshothe.Ndi di-nekedza kha Yesu, ndo vhuya tshothe.
5. ntanzwe namusi Murena, Ndi da ha Yesu,Ndi tshene vhunga Mahada, Yesu ndo vhuya.

title: 57 Uyo A Pfaho
content:
# 57 Uyo A Pfaho

 1. Uyo a pfaho kha vhidzelele, Ivangeli kha i ye lifhasini,Hu re na vhathu nga hu vhidzelelwe, ’Uyo a pfa kha de.’
CHORUSUyo a pfaho kha tavhanyedze,A vhudze vhothe vha re fhano fhasi,Mudzimu U a ni vhidza Idani,’Uyo a pfaho kha de’.
2. Uyo a pfaho kha di-sendedze, Munango wo vulwa u do di dzhena,Ndi nne ndila, u ralo Murena, ’Uyo a pfa kha de.’
3. Ane a pfa kheli fulufhelo, la u tshidzwa hawe kha ili shango.Vhutshilo khovhu u fhiwa nga khotsi, ’Uyo a pfa kha de.’

title: 58 Hu Rendwe Dzina la Yesu
content:
# 58 Hu Rendwe Dzina la Yesu

 1. Hu rendwe dzina la Yesu, Vharunwa vha rende,disani khare tshihosini, Ni mu vhumbe khosi!disani khare tshihosini, Ni mu vhumbe khosi!
2. Inwi mbeu ya Israel, no rengululwaho,Rendani a ni tshidzaho, ni mu vhumbe khosi!Rendani a ni tshidzaho, ni mu vhumbe khosi!
3. Dzitshakha na ndimi dzothe, fhano lifhasini,Nothe hulisani Ene, Ni mu vhumbe khotsi!Nothe hulisani Ene, Ni mu vhumbe khotsi!
4. rine na vhakhethwa vhala, ri we phanda hawe,Ri imbe Iwa misi yothe, Ri mu vhumbe khotsi!Ri imbe Iwa misi yothe, Ri mu vhumbe khotsi!.

title: 59 Yesu Mufuni Wanga
content:
# 59 Yesu Mufuni Wanga

 1. Yesu mufuni wanga, ndi da kha Iwe zwino,Musi ndi kha vhuleme, milingo i tshi anda,U nthule khotsi anga, nthule Mutshidzi wanga,Musi ndi tshi balelwa, U ntanganedze Yesu.
2. A thi na vhushavhelo zwino, ndo lavhelesa khaIwe,U si ntsie ndi ndothe, Ida zwino U ntshidze,Iwe Mutshidzi wanga, u fulufhelo langa,Fukedza thoho yanga, nga phapha dzau Yesu.
3. Ndi funa Iwe fhedzi, U fhira zwithu zwothe,U vuse na vho waho, U fhodze vha lwalaho,Iwe u re Mukhethwa, nne ndi muitazwivhi,Ndi nengisa nga zwivhi, Iwe u wa zwivhuya.
4. U ndadze nga vhukhethwa, ndi tanzwiwe ndi nake,Hu swike u tshidzwa, ndi tambe zwothe zwivhi,Tshisima tsha vhutshilo, avha na nne misi yothe,Tika mbilu yanga, mbilu yanga tshothe.

title: 60 Yesu Iwe Dakalo
content:
# 60 Yesu Iwe Dakalo

 1. Yesu dakalo la mbilu,Iwe tshisima na tshedza,Ro furalela madzanga,Ra vho shavhela kha Iwe.
2. Ngoho yau i sa shanduki,U tshidza vha u vhidzaho,Wo luga kha vharabeli,U zwothe kha vha re vhau.
3. Yesu zwiliwa zwashu,Ri do dzula ri tshi zwi la,Ri nwa kha Iwe tshisima,Ra fhedza dora nga Iwe.
4. Mbilu dzo u tulutshelwa,Hothe hu ne ra tshimbila,Ri di takadzwa nga Iwe,Lutendo lwashu lwa khwatha.
5. Murena dzula na rine,U ri fhe mulalo tshothe,Pandela swiswi la tshivhi,tavhisa tshedza shangoni.

title: 61 Ndi divhe Zwinzhi Nga Yesu
content:
# 61 Ndi divhe Zwinzhi Nga Yesu

 1. Ndi divhe zwinzhi nga Yesu, ndi funze vhanwe nga Ene.Ndi vhone u tshidza hawe, lufuno nge a mpfela.
CHORUSNdi divhe nga Yesu, ndi divhe nga Yesu,Ndi vhone u tshidza hawe, lufuno nge a mpfela.
2. Amba hafhu nga Murena, bula vhuhulwane hawe,A mphe na muya wawe, u divhise Yesu wanga.
3. di-funze hafhu nga Yesu, sendela nga u rabela,Thetshelesa ipfi lawe, u kone u vhudza vhanwe.
4. Amba nga Yesu Murena, nga tshidzulo tsha vhuhosi,Vhulunga idzo ndaela, dza u vhuya ha vhakhethwa.

title: 62 Ndi A U Funa Iwe Yesu Wanga
content:
# 62 Ndi A U Funa Iwe Yesu Wanga

 1. Ndi a U funa Iwe Yesu wanga,Nga Iwe namusi ndi litsha zwivhi,U Mutshidzi wanga mufeli wanga,Zwino Yesu wanga ndi a U funa.
2. Ndi a U funa ngauri wo mpfuna,Wa di-nekedza ngei tshifhammbanoni,Ndi a U funa ngauri wo mpfela,Zwino Yesu wanga ndi a U funa.
3. Kha hone vhutshilo na lwone lufu,Ndi do u rendisa Mutshidzi wanga,Naho ndo thovhoni yanga ya lufu,Zwino Yesu wanga ndi a U funa.
4. Nduni dza vhuhosi ndi do takala,Ngei tadulu ndi do di U renda,Ndi do imba ndo hwala khare yanga,Zwino Yesu wanga ndi a U funa..

title: 63 Ndi do tanzwiwa Hani?
content:
# 63 Ndi do tanzwiwa Hani?

 1. Ndi do tanzwiwa hani? Nga malofha awe fhedzi,Ndi nga tshenisa hani? Ndi nga malofha a Yesu.
CHORUSMaanda ndi malofha, Ane a ntanzwa,A huna tshinwe-vho, malofha a Yesu fhedzi.
2. Ndi wane u tanzwiwa, malofhani a Murena,Ndi kone u hangwelwa, nga malofha a Murena.
3. Ndi nga tshidzwa nga mini? Malofha a Yesu fhedzi,Ndi ndothe a thi koni, Mukoni ndi Ene fhedzi.
4. Ndi fulufhela mini? Malofha a Yesu fhedzi,Ndi do wana zwivhuya malofhani a Murena.

title: 64 Naa Wo Neta?
content:
# 64 Naa Wo Neta?

 1. Naa wo neta mbilu i vhutungu Vhudzai Yesu, vhudzai Yesu,Arali U tshi pfa u na thoni, vhudzai Ene Yesu.
CHORUSVhudzai Yesu, vhudzai Yesu, Yesu khonani yau,A hu tshe na na inwe khonani, vhudzai Ene Yesu.
2. Ndi ngani u tshi tolou lila, Vhudzai Yesu, vhudzai Yesu,U na zwivhi zwi sa divhiwiho? Vhudzai Ene Yesu
3. Mbilu yau i na vhutungu naa? Vhudzai Yesu, vhudzai Yesu,Mbilu yau i lilela mini? Vhudzai Ene Yesu.
4. U kho’ humbula nga ha lufu naa? Vhudzai Yesu, vhudzai Yesu,U lilela muvhuso wawe naa? Vhudzai Ene Yesu.

title: 65 Zwo Naka U Fulufhela
content:
# 65 Zwo Naka U Fulufhela

 1. Zwo naka u fulufhela, u tenda ipfi lawe,U divha fulufheldziso, Na zwe Yesu a amba.
CHORUSYesu, Yesu ndo mu funa, ndo mu sedzisa nne,Yesu fulufhelo langa, mphe tshilidzi na nne.
2. Zwo naka u fulufhela, kha one malofha-vho,divha ilo fulufhelo, zwi isa kha Mutshidzi.
3. Zwo naka u fulufhela, u tshi litsha-vho zwivhi,Yesu we a nembelela, U ri nea malamba.
4. Ndi gude u fulufhela, Yesu Iwe Mutshidzi,Ndi divha uri U na nne, u ya nga hu sa fheli

title: 66 duvha la Dakalo
content:
# 66 duvha la Dakalo

 1. Duvha lone, la u khetha,Iwe Mudzimu Mukhethwa,Ndi zwavhudi, mbilu yanga,I tshi funa na mafhungo
CHORUSLo naka, duvha le, Yesu a ntanzwa zwivhini,O mpfunza u rabela, na u tshila ndo takala,Lo naka duvha le Yesu a ntanzwa zwivhini.
2. Zwo no fhela, zwo no fhela,Ndi wa Yesu, Ene wanga,O mphulusa, nda tevhela,Nga uho u tshidzwa hanga.
3. Mbilu yanga, I awele,I humbule izwi zwithu,I songo vhuya ya tuwa,Murenani misi yothe

title: 67 Kha Vha de Vha Murena
content:
# 67 Kha Vha de Vha Murena

 1. Kha vha de vha Yesu, ri hashe lufuno,Ri imba nyimbo dzavhudi, Ri imba nyimbo dzavhudi,Ri hulisa Yesu, ri hulisa Yesu
CHORUSKha ri ye Tsioni,A si u naka Tsioni, Ri khou ya tadulu,Mudi wavhudi wa Mudzimu.
2. Vha sa mu divhiho, vha litshe u imba,Fhedzi vhana vha Mudzimu, Fhedzi vhana vha Mudzimu,Vha do imbelela, vha do imbelela.
3. Thavhani Tsioni, ri do takalesa,Ndila ya u tadulu, Ndila ya u tadulu,Ndi mususku, fhedzi, ndi musuku fhedzi.
4. Renda-ha nga nyimbo, Fhuluta mitodzi,Thendo kha Immanuele, Thendo kha Immanuele,U murangaphanda, Khosi ya tadulu.

title: 68 Ndo Vhofhololwa Nga Malofha
content:
# 68 Ndo Vhofhololwa Nga Malofha

 1. Ndo vhofhololwa nga malofha, ndo vhofhololwa nga Yesu,Ndo vhofhololwa nga tshilidzi, ndi khae nga hu sa fheli.
CHORUSTshidzwa, Tshidzwa, tshidzwa nga Yesu Murena,Tshidzwa... tshidzwa, Ndi wawe nga hu sa fheli.
2. nne nga malofha ndo tanzwiwa, Hu na dakalo kha nne-vho,Tshila tshedza tshawe tshi kha nne, Ngauri ndo wanwa ngae
3. Nda humbula Mutshidzi wanga, Nda mu elelwa nga misi,Nda imbelela thi fhumuli, Nda renda lufuno lwawe.
4. Ndi do mu vhona kha vhuhosi, Khosi I ri takadzaho,Lufuno lwawe lu a ndinda, Lu’nea tshedza swiswini
5. Khare yanga yo no ndindela, ngei haya ha tadulu,Tsini na vhakhethwa vhawe-vho, Ndi do vha nae tadulu.

title: 69 Ri do Awela Madini A Vhutshilo
content:
# 69 Ri do Awela Madini A Vhutshilo

 1. Ri do awela madini, a bvaho tshisimani,Afho Yesu o lindela, ri do mu vhona hone.
CHORUSRi do awela mulamboni, ri do mu vhona henefho,Ri awela mulamboni, madini a vhutshilo.
2. Ro no neta nga u tshimbila, ri do di awela,Hu na muungo wa madi, ri do tamba henefho.
3. Idani kha Ene Yesu, a no do ni fha Maanda,Ndi Ene madi a vhutshilo, inwa u pfeledze.

title: 70 U do Kuvhanganya Dzitshakha
content:
# 70 U do Kuvhanganya Dzitshakha

 1. U do kuvhanganya dzitshakha, Dzi do vhonala phanda hawe,Ri do vha ri kha tshiimo-de, vhanwe vha tshi mu tanganedza.
CHORUSRine henefho ri do ima ’fhi, nga duvha lihulu,Musi vhathu vha tshi vho khethwa, Nga ilo duvha lihulu.
2. Hu do vha hu tshi vhusa Mutshidzi, Ene Ngwana yo lugaho,A ri nga do tetemela naa, Ra mu shavha ra ya thavhani?
3. Vhanwe u do vha kuvhatedza, Vha re na luswayo lwawe-vho,U do vha ambadza u luga, Vha dzula marumbini awe.
4. Arali ri vha lindelaho, Ri na mbone dzi tshi di duga,Musi muhwe a tshi do swika, Ri do kona u fhufha rothe.
5. Mbilu yanga lilala tadulu, ndi kone u kondelela,Ri khalwo lwendo lwa u tuwa, Lwa u ya muvhusoni wawe.

title: 71 lo nwalwa Naa Dzina langa
content:
# 71 lo nwalwa Naa Dzina langa

 1. Murena zwa shangoni, a si tshithu kha nne,Ndi lilela u dzhena henengei tadulu,Ndi vhe hone-vho buguni yau tadulu,Mmbudze Yesu, dzina langa lo nwalwa naa?
CHORUSLone lo nwalwa naa? lone dzina langaLi nga vha lo nwalwa naa, lone lo dzina langa?
2. Murena ndi na zwivhi zwinzhisa vhukuma,Fhedzi malofha a Ngwana o fanela nne,Na ilo fulufhedziso lo nwaliwaho,’Ndi do ni tanzwa zwivhi zwa nga sa Mahada’.
3. Mudi ri yaho khawo nndu ndi dza vhudi,Hu dzula vhakhethwa vha re na nguvho tshena,A hu nga dzheni zwothe zwithu zwire na tshikha,Vharunwa vha a linda, langa lo nwalwa naa?

title: 72 Khathulo Yo Thoma
content:
# 72 Khathulo Yo Thoma

 1. Khathulo yo thoma ngei tadulu, Hu sedzisiswa nga Maanda,Hu sengiswa zwivhi na zwivhuya, Murena U a vhona.
CHORUSRi do ima ra ri mini, ri do ima ra ri mini?Ri do mu todesa vhukuma, muimeleli washu-vho.
2. Khathulo i thoma kha vho faho, Ha tevhela vha no tshila,Zwi tshi bva buguni ya khathulo, Ine a i shumisa.
3. Ri do ri mini, hu tshi sedzuluswa zwivhi zwashu zwi khagala,Milandu yothe i hatulwa hu si na u do fhindula.

title: 73 Ro Vhidzwa Nga Murena
content:
# 73 Ro Vhidzwa Nga Murena

 1. Ro vhidzwa nga Murena washu, O ri vhidzela zwiliwani,li do vha lihulu dakalo, U dzhena hawe.
CHORUSMurena a tshi dzhena, musi a tshi da,Ri do vha ngafhi-ha rothe, A tshi do vhuya.
2. Khare ya mipfa a i tsheho, Hu na ya vhuhosi thohoni,Zwihulu ri do zwi vhona-ha, U dzhena hawe.
3. Zwothe khathihi a tshi penya, Zwi do dzumbululwa sa duvha,Zwi do dihwa na nga vhahura, U dzhena hawe.
4. Mato awe a do vha vhona, Vho ambaraho dza mutshato,Zwo naka ri tshi nga dzhena-vho, U dzhena hawe.
5. U fhandekana a hu tsheeho, Vho latwaho vha do tambula,li do vha hani ilo duvha? U dzhena hawe.
6. Ri fhe dziphatutshedzo dzau, Ri thuse nga tshilidzi tshau,Uri ri si vhe na dzinyofho, U dzhena hawe.

title: 74 Ri A Zwala Mbeu
content:
# 74 Ri A Zwala Mbeu

 1. Ri a zwala mbeu, mbeu yo lugaho,Matsheloni, masiari na madekwana,Ro rindela-vho tshifhinga tsha u kana,Ri do takala ro hwala mikano.
CHORUSRo hwala khano, ro hwala khano,Ri do takala ro hwala mikano.
2. Ri a zwala mbeu maduvhani othe,A ri nga ofhi khuli ya vhusiku,Ro swika mafheleloni a mushumo,Ri do takala ro hwala mikano.
3. Ri zwalela Murena nga mitodzi,Huno rine a ri ofhi vhuleme,Ho fhela zwililo ri do mu vhona-vho,Ri do takala ro hwala mikano.

title: 75 Ndi Pfa Ipfi la Mulisa Thavhani
content:
# 75 Ndi Pfa Ipfi la Mulisa Thavhani

 1. Ndi pfa ipfi la Mulisa, Kule shangoni la swiswi,li vhidza dzinngu dza Yesu, Dzi re kule na tshitumba.
CHORUSDzi nzheniseni-ha, dzi nzheniseni ha Yesu,Dzi nzheniseni-ha, dzi nzheniseni ha Yesu.
2. Ndi nnyi a no do tshimbila, A yo toda vho xelaho?Vha do tevhelwa nga nnyi, Uri vha de vha sa do fa?
3. I pfani u lila havho, Vhe thavhani dzo lapfaho,Ndi Yesu Mutshidzi washu, U ri vhuisa dzinngu.

title: 76 Tshidzani Vha Faho
content:
# 76 Tshidzani Vha Faho

 1. Tshidzani vhafaho, na vho xelaho,Ni vha tuwise kha zwivhi zwavho, A vuse vho waho,Vusa vha ime, vha vhudze nga Yesu a tshilaho.
CHORUSTshidzani vha faho na vho xelaho,Yesu u na vhuthu u a tshidza.
2. Naho vhu mu sanda, o di lindela,U do tanzwa a rembuluwaho, lingedza nga Maanda,A vha vhuise, vha litshe zwivhi vha tende Yesu.
3. Vho vhaisalaho dzimbilu dzavho,Vha vhudze uri u do vha tanzwa, vha vuse vha ime,Vha tende Yesu, vha de khae, ndi Mutshidzi wavho.

title: 77 Mafhungo A tadulu
content:
# 77 Mafhungo A tadulu

 1. Mafungo a tadulu, a a ntakadzesa;Na lufuno lwa hone, lune lwa ntakadzesa,Luno lu na tshilidzi, luno lu na ngoho,Ndi a fushea nne, u fhirisa zwothe.
CHORUSMafhungo a tadulu, zwo naka u a pfa-vho,Nga Yesu Mukololo, Ene ndi Mutshidzi.
2. Mafhungo a tadulu, ndi a mangadzaho;Lufuno lwa hone, lu fhirisa na dzindoro,Zwo naka u tevhela, we a tshidza nne,Ndi zwine nda di renda, nd i renda kufuno.
3. Thi fhidzi u imba, mafhungo a difhaho,Naho a dovhololwa, a kha di do takadza,Zwo naka ri sa shayi, mafhungo madifha,Mafhungo a u tshidza, Manwalo Makhethwa.
4. Mafhungo a difhaho, a a ntakadza,Ndi pfa ndala khulu, ya mafhungo awe Yesu,Na ngei makoleni, ndi do imba hone,Mafhungo a lufuno, mafhungo a kale.

title: 78 todani Vho Xelaho
content:
# 78 todani Vho Xelaho

 1. todani avho vho xelaho, Ni vha thuse-ha nga tshilidzi;Vha fheni-ha maipfi a Murena, Ane ari: Idani nothe.’
CHORUSIyani-ha kule henengei thavhani,Ni de navho vhothe vha sa mu divhi,Ngomu sambini la Yesu Mufeli,O ombelwa nga vhaitazwivhi.
2. todani avho vho no xelaho, Vhaswogeni-ha vhade khae;Vha kokodzeni nga yone ndila, i no ya hone vhutshiloni.
3. Ndi a tuwa-vho Yesu o mbidza, U ntevhele nga misi yothe.’toda vho faho na vho no waho, u ri vha do divhadzwa Yesu.

title: 79 U Vhidzwa Ha Vhakani.
content:
# 79 U Vhidzwa Ha Vhakani.

 1. Tsimu dzone dzo no lindela, mavhele o vhibva;Dzi re kule ro no dzi vhona, hayani o vhibva.
CHORUSKhosi ya khano thetshelesa, Muthusi ndi Iwe;Vha rume avho vha kanaho, tshifhinga tsho fhira.
2. Vha rume na nga matsheloni, na nga masiari;Naho hu na swiswi lihulu. Vha kana mavhele.
3. Iwe wo runwaho nga Yesu, kana u si bvafhe;Wa fulufhela zwa tadulu, u wana malamba.

title: 80 Shumani
content:
# 80 Shumani

 1. Shumani inwi vhalanda vha Yehova,Ri tevhele ndila ya Murena washu;Ri do wana-vho Maanda nga fhungo lawe,Ri ite nga Maanda kha mushumo wawe.
CHORUSShumani Khwathani,Shumani Khwathani,Lindani no khwatha,Murena u a da zwino.
2. Shumani-ha, vha re na ndala ni vha fhe,Vhadiseni tshisimani tsha vhutshilo,Ri tshi renda tshone tshifhambano tshawe,Ra mbo ri ’Ro wana u tshidzwa nga fhedzi.’
3. Shumani nothe mushumo ndi muhulu;Ngauri muvhuso wa swiswi u do wa,Na dzina la Yehova li do divhiwa;Vha do ri ’Ro wana u tshidzwa nga fhedzi.’
4. Shumani Murena a vhuye a swike,U do rumela vharunwa vha u kana;Ri do dzula na vhakhethwa ri hayani,Ra imba ’Ro wana u tshidzwa nga fhedzi.’

title: 81 Vhusiku Vha A da
content:
# 81 Vhusiku Vha A da

 1. Shuma hu da vhusiku, shuma li tshe hone,Musi u si na Maanda, ho fhela nungo;Tshedza tshi sa vhonali, shuma masiari,Shuma hu da vhusiku, zwothe zwo fhela.
2. Shuma hu da vhusiku, lo kovhela duvha,U shuma duvha lothe, u songo hangwa;U shumise tshifhinga, u si sie fhethu,Shuma hu da vhusiku, zwothe zwo fhela.
3. Shuma hu da vhusiku, mirunzi yo tiba,Thungo ya vhukovhela, duvha lo no ya;Linda u khwathisese, linga u khuthale,li vho ya u kovhela, zwothe zwo fhela.

title: 82 Murena Nga Matsheloni
content:
# 82 Murena Nga Matsheloni

 1. Yesu matsheloni ipfa, u rabela hanga;Iwe ndi do u rabela, ndo U lavhelesa.
2. Nkokodze nga muya wau, ndi ndilani yau;Hothe u tshimbila yanga, nndededze Murena.
3. Vha funaho Iwe Yesu, vha do fushwa vhothe,Mudzimu Ene RaMaanda, U hangwela vhothe.

title: 83 Vhathu Vhothe Kha Ri Imbe
content:
# 83 Vhathu Vhothe Kha Ri Imbe

 1. Vhathu rothe kha ri imbe, ri rende dzina la Yesu;Ndi dzina li ri tshidzaho, rendani dzina la Yesu.
CHORUSRi li khethe-vho, ri li khethe-vho;Ri li khethe-vho, ri li khethe-vho; dzina la Yesu Murena.
2. Yesu ndi Mutshidzi washu, rendani dzina la Yesu;Mu rendeni nga dzithendo, ni rende dzina la Yesu.
3. li ri tanzwa zwivhi zwashu, rendani dzina la Yesu;Yesu o fulufhedzea, rendani dzina la Yesu.

title: 84 Rendani Khotsi
content:
# 84 Rendani Khotsi

 1. Rendani Khotsi Yehova, A nea mpho dzothe;Zwivhumbwa zwothe rendani, Khotsi na Murwa na MuyaAmen!!!

title: 85 Tenda Maanda A Mudzimu
content:
# 85 Tenda Maanda A Mudzimu

 1. Tenda Maanda a Mudzimu, O sika dzithavha,Na lwanzhe lwe a lu ita, na lutombo lwothe.Ndi khoda uvhu vhutali, ho itaho duvha,Na wone nwedzi vhusiku, na dzone dzinaledzi.
2. Imbelela nga dakalo, O ri fha zwiliwa,O sika nga ipfi law, zwothe zwa shangoni,Ri vhona zwi mangadzaho, mashangoni othe,Henefhano fhano fhasi, na ngei tadulu.
3. Zwothe zwithu zwi re hone, zwi tshila nga Ene,Makole na muya zwothe, zwi khoda Musiku,Zwisikwa zwi tshila ngae, zwi fushwa ngae Ene,Ri nga shavhela ngafhi naa? Murena u hone.

title: 86 Rendani Muvhusi
content:
# 86 Rendani Muvhusi

 1. Rendani Muvhusi. Ndi Mukhethwa,Livhuwani lufuno luhulu;Tshitangu tshashu Musiki wa zwotheO dzulaho fhethu hu khethwa-khethwa.
2. Ambani nga lufuno na tshilidzi,Tsha Ene o ambaraho tshedza;Ri vhona mbiti dzawe dzi tshi bvuma,Na kha swiswi musi wa madumbu.
3. U tonda hawe ndi hu hulwane,Ho vhanala kha muya na tshedza;Hu elela hu tshi bva dzithavhani,Hu disa mvula midavhini yothe.
4. rine ri vhana vha buse lawe,Ri fulufhedza Maanda awe;Tshilidzi na lufuno lu sa fheli,Musiki na Mulweli ndi RaMaanda.

title: 87 Khotsi Ri da Ha Iwe
content:
# 87 Khotsi Ri da Ha Iwe

 1. Khotsi ri da kha Iwe a hu na munwe, U mutsireledzi, fulufhelo,Shangoni ndi swiswi arali u siho, Ri fhumudze rothe khotsi-ashu.
CHORUSKhotsi ri da kha ’we si ri sie;A ri tshe na Maanda Yesu ri pfe
2. Ri tshi dzhena rothe maswinani ashu, I vha Mukhuthadzi ri lwendoni,rine ri a ofha khitsi ri khwathise, Nga tshanda tsha Maanda ri phuluse.
3. Ri fhe-vho tshilidzi na luswayo lwau, Bvisa milenzhe yash zwivhini,Ida u ri bvise kha one mathupho, U swika ri tshi swika tadulu.

title: 88 U Songo Mphira Mutshidzi
content:
# 88 U Songo Mphira Mutshidzi

 1. U songo mphira Mutshidzi, Ipfa tshililo;Musi U tshi vhidza vhanwe, U songo mphira.
CHORUSYesu, Yesu, Ipfa tshililo;Musi U tshi vhidza vhanwe,U songo mphira.
2. Tshidzuloni tsha tshilidzi, Ndi vhofhololwe;Ndo gwadama nda dinyadza, Mphe lutendo.
3. Ndi fulufhela tshilidzi, Ndi U vhone-vho;U fhodze-vho muya wanga, thi tsha kona nne.
4. U tshisima tsha phumudzo, U fhira zwothe,Makoleni na shangoni, U thikho yanga.

title: 89 Tshifhinga Tsha U rabela.
content:
# 89 Tshifhinga Tsha U rabela.

 1. Ndi zwavhudi u rabela, zwi do humisa vhutungu;Zwi ntswikisela ha khotsi, zwothe zwine nda zwi shaya.Nga tshifhinga tsha mathupho, ndi a anzela u fhumudzwa;Ndi ponyoke u lingwani, nga tshifhinga tsha thabelo.
2. Ndi zwavhudi u rabela, hu isa khumbelo dzashu;Ngoho yawe i shudufhadza, a mu thetshelesaho,U ri ndi mu fune Ene, ndi tende na ipfi lawe.Ndi do disa zwothe khaE, ndo lindela nga thabelo.
3. Ndi zwavhudi u rabela, u nga ri ndi nga fhumudzwa;Ndi vhuye ndi vhone haya, ndi fulufhele-vho hone,Nda wana muvhili muswa, ndi yo wana vho mukovhe;Ndi huwelele ndi tshi ri, sala zwavhudi thabelo.

title: 90 Mushumo Wa maduvha Matanu na lithihi Wo Fhela
content:
# 90 Mushumo Wa maduvha Matanu na lithihi Wo Fhela

 1. Mushumo wo no di fhela, Ro thoma inwe Savhatha,Muya wanga awela-vho, Hulisa duvha likhethwa.
2. Ida u rende Murena, U awele wo takala,Ri do fhiwa phathutshedzo, dza fhira dza minwe misi.
3. Mihumbula na ndivhuwo dzashu dzi rende Mudzimu,Ri wane kha Kristo vhuawela ha vha mu divhaho
4. Mulalo wa vha mbiluni ndi vhuawelo ha khwine;Fulufhelo la vhatendi, li pandelaho matungu.

title: 91 Fhatuwani Tshifhinga Ndi Tshipfufhi
content:
# 91 Fhatuwani Tshifhinga Ndi Tshipfufhi

 1. Fhatuwa Murena a tshi vhidzelela,Dzula wo mu lindela nga nungo dzothe;Khwathisani vhatendi swina lo halifha,Fhatuwani nangwe muhwe a tshi lenga.
CHORUSDzulani ni tshi rabela,Lindelani vhusiku na masiari,Nothe ni ralo.
2. Pandelani khofhe, ni songo gungula,Ni do fhiwa malamba a vhuawelo,Fhatuwa, rabela, na Yesu o ralo;A bvisa na biko, malofha a rotha.
3. Fhulufhelani Yesu, thanyelani Swina,Ambarani thovho ni lindele Yesu,Musi lo no tsha ni songo vhya na hangwa;Tshone tshifhinga tshau lindela Yesu.

title: 92 Ni Songo I Hangwa Savhatha
content:
# 92 Ni Songo I Hangwa Savhatha

 1.Ni songo i hangwa Savhatha ya Mudzimu,Ndi yone yo khethwaho kha maduvha othe;Ro fanele u awela mishumoni yashu-vho,Yesu a tshi ri sika, o sila Savhatha.
CHORUSli takaleleni-ha duvha la Savhatha,li takaleleni-ha duvha la Savhatha.
2.   Vhulunga Savhatha, hulisani Mudzimu,O ri sumbedza ná¸’la ya u ya tadulu;Ro fanela u tevhedza, Mutshidzi washu Yesu,U ri neamadi a vhutshilo ha-vhudi.
3.   Ri do di U renda, nga duvha lo khethwaho,Iwe khonani yashu Yesu a funwaho,Murena Yesu u na lufuno lu mangadzaho,Na fulufhelo lau li a ri takadza.

title: 93 duvha la U Awela Na Dakalo
content:
# 93 duvha la U Awela Na Dakalo

 1.duvha la u awela, duvha la dakalo,li tusa matungu, na zwothe zwi dinaho;Vha a mu renda nga-lo, na vha makoleni,Vha tshi mu khoda vha ri, nd Mukhethwa-Khethwa.
2.   U bako la vhukuma, Musi wa madumbuTsimu i no shelwa madi a PharadisoMadi a shothodzo shangoni la mathuphoKha iwe ri vho vhona zwa shango li daho.
3.   duvha la u diphina, lavhudi vhathuni,line ra humbula, nga zwothe zwa tadulu;Nga ili duvha rothe ri wana mashudu,Ra awela rothe, nga u ralo tadulu.

title: 94 Ndi Tshikolo Tsha Savhatha
content:
# 94 Ndi Tshikolo Tsha Savhatha

 1.Ndi tshikolo tsha Savhatha,Tshi takadza mbiluMbilu yanga i elelwa,duvha la Savhatha.
CHORUSSavhatha, ya-vhudi,Savhatha, ya-vhudiMbilu yanga i elelwa,duvha la Savhatha.
2.   Afha ndo thoma u vhona,Ndila ya vhutshiloHuno nda sedza zwa-vhudi,Nda wana hayani.
3.   Yesu a mbo ima hone,A mbidza na nne-vhoUri ndi de ndi mu khethe,Na Savhatha yawe.

title: 95 Murena Wo Ri Linda
content:
# 95 Murena Wo Ri Linda

 1.Murena wo ri linda kha maduvha a vhege,Ri nee Phathutshedzo musi ri phanda hau,Heli duvha lavhudi li sumbedza zwIdaho,Heli duvha lavhudi li sumbedza zwIdaho.
2.   Ri humbela tshilidzi, nga dzina lau Mutshidzi,Ri sedze nga tshilidzi, U tuse zwivhi zwashu,Ri ruliwe mathupho ri awele na Iwe,Ri ruliwe mathupho ri awele na Iwe.
3.   Ri renda dzina lau, i vha tsini na rine,Ri vhone vhurena hau, musi ri nduni yau,Ri thetshedze namusi vhudi vhu sa fheliho,Ri thetshedze namusi vhudi vhu sa fheliho.
4.   Fhungo lau kha li pfale,li kunde vhuvhi hothe,Hu vhone mitshelo yalo dzimbiluni dzashu,Ri rende nga Savhatha u swikela u tshi da,Ri rende nga Savhatha u swikela u tshi da.

title: 96 Ida duvha la U Awela
content:
# 96 Ida duvha la U Awela

 1.Ro takala namusi, Nga vhuawelo hashuHu a ri takadzesa, Sa u da ha madautsha.
2.   Ndi duvha la u’ tshete, Na u renda MudzimuNga lone ri humbula Musiki wa tadulu.
3.   duvha la u awela duvha la u rendiwaNdi duvha la u divha dziphathutshedzo dzawe.

title: 97 Ro Zwi Pfa
content:
# 97 Ro Zwi Pfa

 1.Ro pfa nga ha Murena, Yesu ndi Mutshidzi;Vhudzani tshakha dzothe, nga Yesu Murena,Vhidzelela kha shango, na kha malwanzhe othe,Yesu u a ni vhidza, ndi Ene Mutshidzi.
2.   Vhudzani vha re vhavhi, Vha de ha Murena;U do vha tanzwa zwivhi, Vha khethwa vha khethwa;Imbelelani nyimbo, dzi pfiwe mashangoni,Shango li do awedzwa, nga Yesu Mutshidzi.
3.   Huwelelani nothe, nga Yesu Murena.Nga lufu na vhutshilo, ha Yesu Mutshidzi;Imbani na swiswini, nga tshilidzi tsha Yesu,U do kunda livhIda, nga Yesu Murena.
4.   Posa ipfi muyani, u ambe nga Yesu;Hothe Yesu u hone, A divhaho zwothe,Muthu a tshi rabela, e hothe tshiphiriniMudzimu u a mu pfa, A di mu fhindula.

title: 98 Kha Ndi Ende Na Mutshidzi
content:
# 98 Kha Ndi Ende Na Mutshidzi

 1.Kha ndi ende na Mutshidzi, Ndi ndothe a thi koniNdi Mu pfe e tsini na nne, A tshi n-kuvhatedza.
CHORUSMuya wanga si ofhe, Litsha a range phanda;Naho a tshi nnyisa hothe, ndi do di mu tevhela.
2.   Kha ndi ende na Mutshidzi, Lutendo lu tshi dzima,U do amba a phumudzo, A sa konwi nga munwe.
3.   Kha ndi ende na Mutshidzi, kha u tshimbila hanga;Kha madumbu na kha duvha, na vhukati ha mipfa.
4.   Kha ndi ende na Mutshidzi, A linde ndila yanga;Ndi vhuye ndi swike Yordan, Na fhala seli hawo.

title: 99 Ndi Tshi Sedza Tshifhambano
content:
# 99 Ndi Tshi Sedza Tshifhambano

 1.Ndi tshi sedza tshifhambanoHo felaho Yesu wangaLupfumo na u dihudza hangaZwothe ndi lifhedzi.
2.   Ri vhona kha zwanda zwaweNa milenzhe ndi ntho fhedziO phulelwa zwivhi zwashuMipfa yo vha khare
3.   nne ndo vha ndo no xelesaNda wana-vho u hangwelwaA thi koni u dikhodaNdi khoda Murena.
4.   Naho nne ndi na lupfumoZwi nga si kone u nthusaNga hei mpho ya lufunoNdi mu fha vhutshilo.

title: 100 Ri Na thama Khulu Yesu
content:
# 100 Ri Na thama Khulu Yesu

 1.Ri na thama khulu Yesu, O hwala zwivhi zwashu;Zwo naka u isa khae, zwothe nga dzithabelo,Ri xelelwa nga mulalo, Mu ngafha-ngafha nandi!Nge ra si ise zwililo, Kha Yesu nga thabelo.
2.   Ri nao na matungu vho? Milingo na khakhathi?Ri songo vhuya ra shavha, Kha ri rabele Ene:Ri nga wana’fhi khonani, i ngaho Ene Yesu?Ndi Ene we a ri divha, Musi ri tshi rabela.
3.   Ri lemelwa nga mihwalo, Mulingo na mathupho,Mutshidzi washu muhulu, Ri a mu rabela-vho;Ri tutshela dzikhonani, Kha ri mu vhudze zwothe;U a ni kwengweledza-ha, U do ni tsireledza.

title: 101 Yesu U A Vhidza
content:
# 101 Yesu U A Vhidza

 1.Yesu u ri Idani hayani, U vhidza inwi namusi;U si lambe musi wa u tshidzwa, U landulela mini?
CHORUSU ya vhidza, Inwi zwinoYesu U khou ni vhudza nga khumbelo khulu.
2.   Na vho netaho u a vha vhidza, U a vha vhidza namusi;Ida kha Ene, U fhatutshedzwe, nga Ene Yesu zwino.
3.   Ida-ha zwino o u lindela, O lindela iwe zwino;’da na zwivhi u di tukufhadze, U songo hangwa, Ida.
4.   U tshi mu toda u ya u thusa, U ya thusa, ada namusi;Vhane vha tenda vha do takala, tavhanya u a vhidza.

title: 102. Mu Vulele A Dzhene
content:
# 102. Mu Vulele A Dzhene

 1.Mueni munangoni, kha dzhene;Ndi kale o lindela, kha dzheneMueni A songo huma, kha dzhene ndi Mukhethwa,Yesu murwa wa Khotsi, kha dzhene.
2.   Muneye mbilu yau, kha dzhene;Nangani Ene zwino, kha dzhene;Khoyo e munangoni, Ri do newa dakalo;Rendani dzina lawe, kha dzhene.
3.   Ipfa a tshi u vhidza, kha dzhene;Mutende zwino Yesu, kha dzheneA saathu u nala, Yesu u do u tshidza,Rabela dzina lawe, kha dzhene.
4.   U vhidzwa nga Mudzimu, kha dzhene;Mutanganedze zwino, kha dzheneU do hangwelwa zwivhi, Uya nga hu sa fheli;A u isa tadulu, kha dzhene.

title: 103. Dovhani Ni Bebwe
content:
# 103. Dovhani Ni Bebwe

 1. Linwe gota li tshi da ha Yesu,la vhudzisa Yesu nga u tshidziwa;Mutshidzi a takutshedza nga u ri,’Dovha u bebiwe!’ (hafhu)
CHORUSU bebiwe hafhu, U bebiwe hafhu,Ngoho, ngoho, ndi amba na’we ndi ri.’Dovha u bebiwe!’ (hafhu)
2. Vhoinwi vhathu nothe shangoni,Ipfani ipfi la Yesu Murena;Ni tshi talukanya maipfi haya,’Dovha u bebiwe!’ (hafhu)
3. Inwi ni funaho vhuawelo,Ni rende na vhatshidzwa nga luimbo;Ni tshi tama u dzhena vhutshiloni,’Dovha u bebiwe!’ (hafhu)

title: 104. Ida Muvhofhololi
content:
# 104. Ida Muvhofhololi

 1. Ndi a u lilela Ida kha nne, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;Ndi a u dzindela Ida kha nne, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;
CHORUSNdo vha ndo xela ngei dzithavhani, nda vha kule na hayani;Khumise ndi vhuyele hayani, Ida-ha Mutshidzi.
2. A thi na vhuawelo vhusiku, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;Wa ndavhelesa ndi n ga di tshila, Ida-ha Mutshidzi.
3. Ndi tshimbila ndaila dzi kondaho, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;Mato anga a lilala kha’we, Ida-ha Mutshidzi.
4. U si sande u di-nyadza hanga, Ida-ha Mutshidzi;Ndi a lila apfa thabelo yanga, Ida-ha Mutshidzi.

title: 105. Vha Kule Na Tsini
content:
# 105. Vha Kule Na Tsini

 1. Vha kule na tsini no vhofhololwaVho-inwi ni pfaho no vhofhololwa;Kha wone mulilo na khathuloni yaYesuMutshidzi ine ya do da.
CHORUSU ri vhofholola na u ri tshidzaMusi ri tshi tenda khonani yanga.
2. Zwi nga itea naa? Ni vhofhololweMaanda a hone naa? Ndi vhofhololweMbudze fhungo ngoho nga Yesu Kristo;Ene kha ntshidze-vho Yesu Kristo;Ene kha ntshidze-vho kha Sathani.
3. Inwi ni ofhaho no vhofhololwaNi tenda Yesu naa? A re Mutshidzi.Si ofhe Sathane, Iya kha YesuLitshani u ofha, ima u khwathe.

title: 106. Ri Fhate Kha Tombo li Tshilaho
content:
# 106. Ri Fhate Kha Tombo li Tshilaho

 1. Ri fhata kha tombo li tshilaho, Yesu tombo la kale,Ndi hone ri tshi do khuda, Mudzinginyo na milingo.
CHORUSRi do fhata-ha, Ri do fhata-ha,Ri do fhata kha Kristo tombo lo khwathaho la Maanda
2. vhanwe vha fhata mutavhani, na kha lupfumo lwa shango,vhanwe vho di tika zwivhini, kha dakalo la shango.
3. Fhata kha tombo la u khwatha, kha murango wo khwathaho,Ene fulufhelo la kale, la u tshidzwa ha vhathu.

title: 107. Mmbudze Mafhungo A Yesu
content:
# 107. Mmbudze Mafhungo A Yesu

 1. Mmbudze mafhungo a Yesu, nwala mbiluni yanga,Mmbudze mafhungo mahulu, a vhudi a sa dihwi;Bulani zwe na vharunwa vha imba a tshi bebwa,Thendo kha Mudzimu khotsi, na mulalo kha vhathu.
CHORUSMmbudze mafhungo a Yesu, nwala mbiluni yanga,Mmbudze mafhungo mahulu, avhudi a sa dihwi.
2. O didzima E sogani, bula misi ya hone,O lingelwa zwivhi zwashu, a fhedza nga u kunda;Bula nga mishumo yawe, na vhutungu he a pfa,O nyadzwa a rwiwa, a shaya haya, a naledzwa.
3. Amba nga u vhambwa hawe, na nga u vhaisala,Na zwa tshalo he a switwa, na nga u vuwa hawe;Zwothe zwi amba lufuno, lune lwa sathu u vhonwa,Ndi a lila ndi tshi zwi pfa lufuno lwo nthengaho.

title: 108. U Vhidza Nga Lufuno
content:
# 108. U Vhidza Nga Lufuno

 1. Murena ndi Mulisa, U ri Ida kha nne,U dzumbame dangani, u wane vhuthsilo;Ida u tshe na Maanda, Ida u tshe muswa,Dzhena dangani lawe, kha ndila ya ngoho.
CHORUSNga lufuno Yesu u a ri vhidza,’Iwe wo xelaho Ida kha nne.’Na zwino u tshe o ri lindela,Yesu Mulisa wanga.
2. Yesu Mulisa wanga; we a ri fela-vho,U a u fhembeledza, ’Ida kha nne zwino.’Afho nnda hu na khombo, Ipfa u tshi vhidzwa,Dzhena dangani lawe kha ndila ya ngoho.
3. Dzhena ’si tima-time, nnda hu na phele,Dzine dza nga huvhadza nngu dzo xelaho;Yesu mulisa washu u a ri vhidza-ha,Dzhena dangani lawe, kha ndila ya ngoho.

title: 109. Wo Kalwa Wa Leluwa
content:
# 109. Wo Kalwa Wa Leluwa

 1. Murena o hatula zwo livhanaho na rine,Ri do vha musuku naa, kana ri do vha manyelo?
CHORUSRi do elwa nga Murena, ni khou leluwa;Ri do elwa nga Mulayo, ha vhonwa ndeme.
2. Ri do pfa mavhuya na? ’Mulanda wavhudi-vhudi!’Kana u vho do latwa; Nge wa vha a leluwaho.
3. Muya u a ri vhidza, tshilidzi tshi tshe hone-vho;Khamusi hu do valwa, ho nwalwa ’Na latwa tshothe.’

title: 110. Mashudu Vha Itaho
content:
# 110. Mashudu Vha Itaho

 1. Ipfa maipfi a Mutshidzi, Ndi maipfi a vhutshilo.Ipfa, U humbule zwe Yesu a ri: ’Mashudu kha vha no zwi ita
CHORUSMashudu vhothe vha thetshelesaho milayo ya Mudzimu.Mashudu ndi a vhane vha pfa milayo yawe, shudu nandi!
2. U pfa milayo na mafulufhedziso ndi mahandana,Arali ri sa zwi tevheli zwothe, ’Mashudu kha vha no zwi ita.’
3. Nga dakalo vha do dzheniswa mudini wa mulalovho,Vha do dzula vhe vhakhethwa vha bvumo, vha la mitshelo ya vhutshilo.

title: 111. A Huna munwe
content:
# 111. A Huna munwe

 1. Ndi nnyi khonani i ngaho Yesu? A huna! A huna!A nga fhodzaho malwadze ashu? A huna! A huna!
CHORUSU a divha mathupho ashu, Nga Ene a do fheliswa,Ndi nnyi khonani i ngaho Yesu, A huna! A huna!
2. A huna munwe a re Mukhethwa,A huna! A huna!E mu dzia u di-tukufhadza, A huna! A huna!
3. Ha koni u vha kule na rine, ha koni, ha funi!Na vhusiku u tsini na rine, u tsini na rine.
4. No vhuya na pfa a tshi ni hana? Ho ngo ni landula!Ha ngo vhuya a hana mutshinyi, haho na muthihi!
5. Naa hu na mpho i fhiraho Yesu? A huna! A huna!U do ri hana makoleni naa? Ha nga do ri hana!

title: 112. Huna Vhutshilo Kha Tshifhambano
content:
# 112. Huna Vhutshilo Kha Tshifhambano

 1. Hu na vhutshilo kha tshifhambano, Yesu u ri sedza tshone;Zwa lino shango ndi lifhedzi, Sedza lupfumo kha tshifhambano.
CHORUSSedzesa, U do tshila, sedzesa tshifhambano;Humbula-vho vhukhethwa, sedzesa tshifhambano.
2. Nga duvha le nda vhona Mutshidzi, a takala a tshi mmbona;Musi ndi tshi dzhena zwivhini, nda sedza Tshifhambano ndo tshila.
3. Ndo dzula ndo sedza Tshifhambano, ndo fulufhela Mudzimu;Sathane ha fhenyi muthu o fulufhela Maanda a tadulu.

title: 113. Yesu U A Ni Vhidza
content:
# 113. Yesu U A Ni Vhidza

 1. Yesu u a ni vhidza nga vhulenda, U vhidza iwe na nne;Vothini la mbilu o di lindela, U sedza iwe na nne.
CHORUSIda haya, Wo neta Ida haya;Yesu u a ni vhidza nga vhulenda,U vhidza iwe na nne.
2. Ni lengelani ni Yesu a tshi vhidza, U vhidza iwe na nne;Ni lengelani na nyadza tshilidzi, Tshilidzi kha ’we na nne.
3. Tshifhinga na zwikhathi zwi a fhira, zwi fhira iwe na nne;Mirunzi i tshi da na lufu lwa da, Lu swika kha ’we na nne.
4. Humbula fulufhedziso, lufuno, ndi la iwe na nne-vho;Naho ro tshinya u do ri hangwela, U ri hangwela rothe.

title: 114. Munango Wo Vulelwa nne
content:
# 114. Munango Wo Vulelwa nne

 1. Hu na khoro yo vulwaho, yo vulelwa vhatshinyi,Wo thoma tshifhambanoni, ndi lufuno lwa Yesu.
CHORUSTshilidzi tshi sa fheliho, khoro yo vulelwa nne naa?nne naa? nne naa? Yo vulelwa nne naa?
2. Heyo khoro yo vulelwa, vha funaho vhutshilo,Vhothe vhathu na vhatsinda, na magogo a shango.
3. Ibvani kha zwivhi zwothe, zwino hu tshe ho vulwa,Khare kheyo i lweleni, ndi tsumbo ya lufuno.
4. Seli lula lwa mulambo, ro lata zwifhambano,Ro newa khare ya tshedza, ri do takadzwa ngayo.

title: 115. nanga Khulu
content:
# 115. nanga Khulu

 1. Nanga khulu ndi Murena, Yesu u na tshilidzi;U vusa mbilu yo faho, ipfani ipfi lawe.
CHORUSRenda dzina la Yesu, ndi dzina li takadzaho;Mu huliseni nothe, Yesu ndi Mukhethwa.
2. Zwivhi zwothe zwo hangelwa, ipfani ipfi lawe;Ri tshimbile nga mulalo, ri do fhiwa dzikhare.
3. Kha ri rende Ngwana rothe, ri tende Yesu rothe;Ndi a funa dzina ili, la Yesu Muphulusi.
4. Dzina ili li pandela, U ofha hanga hothe;Muya wanga u takadzwa, nga dzina la Murena.
5. Na musi a tshi do vhuya, na khare dza vhutshilo;Ra dzula nae Murena, ra amba nga u tshidzwa.

title: 116. A Huna Tshi Re Tsha Yesu
content:
# 116. A Huna Tshi Re Tsha Yesu

 1. U ofha ha vhatendi, a hu na Yesu kha vho.Vho fashwa nga zwikwekwe, a hu na Yesu kha vho,Vhona u munangoni, U khou omba-omba;Thetshelesa u vule a wane-vho vhudzulo.
2. Tshifhinga tshi a fhela, Murena ha shumelwi;Nga Maanda e na fhiwa, ni mu shumela lini?Tshivhi a ni tshi koni, a ni wani vhaxeli,Mutodi wa zwa shango, ha nga shumeli Yesu.
3. Mutodi wa lupfumo, ha funi zwa Murena;U dzima zwithu zwothe, ha nei na Murena,Lupfumo na zwa shangoni ndi zwone zwe na funa;Ni funa zwi re zwanu, a ni shumeli Yesu.
4. Ndi mutokola fhedzi, mitshelo naa i ngafhi?Hu vhonala matari, a huna na mitshelo,A i wanali mbeu, a no ngo shuma tshithu,A ni nga do takala, ni tshi ya ha Murena.

title: 117. Ndi A da Murena
content:
# 117. Ndi A da Murena

 1. Ndi pfa Ipfi lau, Yesu u tshi mmbidza;U ri ndi de ndi tanzwiwe, nga malofha au.
CHORUSNdi a da Yesu, kha Iwe zwino;Ndi tambe malofhani, a bvaho Khalivari.
2. Nangwe ndi mutshinyi, ndi a u humbela;U ntanzwe hothe vhutshinyi, ndi itwe mukhethwa.
3. Yesu u khou mmbidza, nga lufuno lwawe;Uri ndi de kha vhuhosi, ha ngei tadulu.
4. Yesu ndi Mutshidzi, o nthengulula-vho;Nga malofha a mutengo, ngei Tshifhambanoni.

title: 118. Yesu O Rengulula Zwothe.
content:
# 118. Yesu O Rengulula Zwothe.

 1. Ndi pfa Yesu u ri, ’A una na Maanda;Linda nga thabelo, ndi do u nea zwothe.’
CHORUSYesu Mutshidzi, ndi a livhuwa,O rengulula zwothe, vhuvhi hanga hothe.
2. Murena ndi vhonesa, Maanda kha iwe,A tanzwe mapele, na mbilu ya tombo.
3. Ndi muvhi muhulu, ndi lila tshilidzi,Ndi do tanzwa nguvho, malofhani awe.
4. Ndi ima phanda hau, ndo no vha mukhethwa,Ndo vhea Maanda anga, phanda ha Iwe-vho.

title: 119. Gabelo li tanzwaho
content:
# 119. Gabelo li tanzwaho

 1. Kheli gabelo litswuku, lo tsa lo atama;Yesu u a tshidza vhothe, U sumba nthoni.
CHORUSLutsinga kholu lwa u tamba, zwino ndi a tamba hafhu;Kha hu rendwe ene Yesu, ndo tanzwiwa, ee o ntanzwa.
2. Ndi wana u sikwa huswa, hone malofhani;Zwivhi zwothe zwi do fhela, zwa fa nga Murena.
3. Ndi tshimbila ndi tshedzani, ndi tshi ya tadulu;Nguvho dzanga dzo tanzwiwa, nga Yesu Murena.
4. Ndi tshimangadzo tsha Yesu, tsha u rengwa hanga;Ndi Yesu a zwi divhaho, zwa u tshidzwa hanga.

title: 120. Ndi A Tenda
content:
# 120. Ndi A Tenda

 1. Ndi dikumedza kha Iwe,’da i vha Mutshidzi,Wa mpandela phanda hau,Ndi do ya ngafhi naa?
CHORUSZwino ndi a fulufhela,Yesu o mpfela,Ene we malofha awe,A ntanzwa zwivhi
2. Ndi tenda lufuno lwau,Kha U mphe Maanda,Mbofholole kha zwikwekwe,Ndi phuluswe zwino.
3. Khotsi anga Mato anga,A lilale kha’we,Ndi kone u wana dzanga,Muya u tshidziwe.

title: 121. Ndi do Imba Lufuno Lwa Yesu.
content:
# 121. Ndi do Imba Lufuno Lwa Yesu.

 1. Ndi do ima nga lufuno, lwa Yesu we a mpfuna,O siya litadulu, a fa tshifhambanoni.
CHORUSNdi imba nga lufuno, mbilu yanga renda,O ntshidza nga lufuno, Ndi imba nga lufuno.
2. Ndi sa’thu na u lila, Yesu a mbo nndilelaNdi sa’thu na u rabela, Ene a nthabelela.
3. Lufuno ulwo a luho fhano na litaduluLwo ntanzwa zwivhi zwothe, zwa nga sa Mahada.
4. Naho ndi songo luga, Ene o di mpfuna,A rudza mbilu yanga, Nthuse ndi u fune.

title: 122. Tsini-Tsini
content:
# 122. Tsini-Tsini

 1. Tsini-tsini na mbilu yau, Ntsendedze Iwe Yesu wanga;Nkuvhatedza-ha Yesu wanga, Iwe ndzumbe kha vhuawelo hau,Iwe ndzumbe kha vhuawelo hau.
2. Tsini na Iwe a thi na na tshithavhelo-vho Murena wanga;Fhedzi ndi disa mbilu yanga, ntanzwe nga malofha a Mutshidzi.ntanzwe nga malofha a Mutshidzi.
3. Tsini na Iwe u ntsendedze, Ndi kone u furalela zwivhi;Madakalo na u dihudza, Ndi de ha Yesu o vhambiwaho;Ndi de ha Yesu o vhambiwaho.
4. Kha Iwe vhu hone vhutshilo, Kha ndi dzumbiwe ngei vhugalani;Ndi vhe hone lini na lini, Tsini na Iwe Mutshidzi wanga,Tsini na Iwe Mutshidzi wanga.

title: 123. Dzina Li Re likhethwa
content:
# 123. Dzina Li Re likhethwa

 1. Dzina lone li funwaho, ndi line nda li divha;lo nekedzwa nga Mudzimu, nga murwa a funwaho.
CHORUSNdi lone likhethwa, ndi lone likhethwa;lo bva tadulu la swika fhano,lo da na vharunwa nga vhunwe vhusiku,ndi lone dzina la Yesu.
2. Kha nne li da na mashudu, uri ndi mu rende-vho;Ndi imba dzina la Ene na hone vhudi halo.
3. Ndi imbela luimbo ngauri ndo vhofhololwa,Ndi rende lini na lini, dzina lo ambiwaho.

title: 124. Nga Hu Rendwe Kristo Kha nne
content:
# 124. Nga Hu Rendwe Kristo Kha nne

 1. Kristo nga a rendwe, hu si rendwe nne;Kristo nga a pfiwe a vhoniwe.Kha zwiito zwothe hu vhuse KristoA vhe e muhumbuloni tshothe.
2. matunguni A di ni fhembeledzaA fhulute Matodzi Matoni.A nthule mihwalo i lemelahoA pandele na u ofha hothe.
3. Kristo Ene a hu na dzina linwe,Ndi si di dine Kristo e honeNdi si dihudze na Kristo e honenne a tuwe, hu sale Kristo.
4. Kristo u divha na vhushayi hanga.Maanda othe ndi a wana khae;Muvhulungi wa zwothe zwi re zwangaKha zwi ralo, nga hu sa fheliho.

title: 125. Tshedza Mbiluni
content:
# 125. Tshedza Mbiluni

 1. Hu na duvha dzithavhani; Hu a penya na lwanzhe,Hu a penya midavhini, na hatsini havhudi;Tshedza tshavhudi tshi penya ngomu mbiluni yanga.Hune Yesu a vha e hone, hu na tshedza tshavhudi
CHORUSItsho tshedza, tshedza tshavhudi;Tshi vhonetshela mbilu,Yesu u bvisa vhutungu, hu a penya mbiluni.
2. Ndi sia matungu anga, u nga nguvho ya kale;Wo nyambadza nga dakalo, wa mpfunza u U renda,Haya hu swa ha tadulu, he nda lugiselwa-vho.Ndi a disa mbilu yanga, na muya wa dakalo.
3. Ndo rengwa nga Yesu wanga, zwanga zwothe ndi zwawe;Luvhone lwanga lwo fungwa, lu mu rende nga misi.Haya huswa ha tadulu, he nda lugiselwa-vho.Ndi a disa mbilu yanga, na muya nga dakalo.

title: 126. Ndo Vhofhololwa
content:
# 126. Ndo Vhofhololwa

 1. Ndi na luimbo lwa thendo, lwa u vhofhololwa;Nga Mutshidzi khotsi-anga, we a mbofholola.
CHORUSTshe nda vhofhololwa, tshe nda vhofhololwa;Thendo kha dzina lawe, tshe nda vhofhololwa,Ndi do mu renda Yesu wanga.
2. U mpfushisa nga vhurena, nga u vhofhololwa;Ndi ite lufuno lwawe, O mbofholola-vho.
3. Na vhutungu vhu khagala, ha u tshidzwa hanga;Vhu tusa u tima-tima, na u ofha hothe.
4. Wo mbetshela haya hanga, wo mbofholola-vho;Nda dzula nga hu sa fheli, ndo vhofhololwa nne.

title: 127. U A Mpfuna Na nne
content:
# 127. U A Mpfuna Na nne

 1. Musi thongola i tshi wa u a i vhona-vho;U funa zwothe zwinoni u funa na nne-vho.
CHORUSU a mpfuna, U a mpfuna, U funa na nne-vho;Na zwithu zwitukutuku U a zwi funa-vho.
2. U nakisa na maluvha a tshi tou fhefheda;U funa othe maluvha, na nne u a mpfuna.
3. Mudzimu o sika zwothe, zwa fhano shangoni;Vhana vhatuku ndi vhawe, na nne U a mpfuna.

title: 128. Tshifhinga Tsha Thabelo
content:
# 128. Tshifhinga Tsha Thabelo

 1. Tshifhinga tsha thabelo, mbilu dzi vhutungu,Ri tangana kha Yesu, khonani yashu;Ri ya khae nga u tenda, O ri tsireledza,Hu rulwa vho netaho, vha do wana Maanda.
CHORUSTshifhinga tsha-vhudi, tsho shudufhadziwa,Hu rulwa vho netaho, vha do wana malamba.
2. Tshifhinga tsha thabelo, U tsini na rine,U khathutshela vhothe, vha rabelaho;U ri matungu othe, a kumedzwe khae,Hu rulwa vho netaho, vha do wana Maanda.
3. Tshifhinga tsha thabelo, milingo yo dala,Kha ri sendele khae, Mutshidzi washu;Ene u nao Maanda, a bvisa vhutungu,Hu rulwa vho netaho, vha do wana Maanda.
4. Tshifhinga tsha thabelo, ri tenda Mutshidzi,Ri do wana mashudu, ane ra lila;Ri tshi mu fulufhela, ri sa vhilaleli,Hu rulwa vho netaho, vha do wana Maanda.

title: 129. Ida Yesu U Ri Fhatutshedze
content:
# 129. Ida Yesu U Ri Fhatutshedze

 1. Yesu Iwe wo ri, ’Hune vhakhethwaVha do kuvhangana, nga dzina langa,Ndi do vha henefho, nda fhatutshedza.’Ida u ri tanzwe, u fhatutshedze.
CHORUSYesu ’da u ri fhatutshedze rothe;U ri fhatutshedze, I vha tsini-ha.
2. Yesu wo vha hone kale na kale;Ri a di U funa, nga misi yothe,Ida-ha Mutshidzi, a re Mukhethwa,Ri pfe ri a lila nga thabelo.
3. Ri imbela Iwe, thendo dzavhudi;Ida thabeloni, ri fhatutshedze,U ri vhonetshele ndilani yau,Khwathisa lutendo, na fulufhelo.

title: 130. Ndi Wau Murena
content:
# 130. Ndi Wau Murena

 1. Ndi wau Murena, ndo pfa ipfi lau li bula lufunoNdi tama lutendo lwo khwathaho, ndi kokodzelwe tsini.
CHORUSNdi sendedzwe Murena wanga tsini na tshifhambanoNdi sendedzwe tsini, tsini Murena ene o mpfelaho.
2. Nkhethele mushumo Murena nga Maanda a tshilidzi.Ndi vhe na fulufhelo muyani ndi ite lufuno lwau.
3. Dakalo vhukuma ndi li wana musi ndi tsini hauNdi tshi rabela ndi amba na’we sa khonani vhukuma.
4. Hu na lufuno hu na dakalo zwine ra sa zwi divheRi do zwi divha ro no vha seli ro awela kha iwe.

title: 131. Kha Ndi Fane Na Yesu
content:
# 131. Kha Ndi Fane Na Yesu

 1. Kha ndi fane na Yesu, Ene Murena wanga;Tenda Mutshidzi wanga, a de a dzule na nne.Kha ndi fane na Yesu, shangoni fhano fhasi;Ndi lila muya wau, dzula na nne Mutshidzi.
2. Zwinoni zwi tshi tshila, U a zwi lavhelesa;A tshi vhona zwi tshi wa, ngoho na nne U do mpfa,U sedza ndila yanga, uri a ndendedze-vho;Ndi funa u khethiwa. Dzula na nne Mutshidzi.
3. Kha ndi fane na Yesu, ndi tshile misi yothe;Ndi funa u awela, fhethu ho fhumulaho,Ndo bebiwa nga huswa, nga lufuno lwa Yesu;Kha ndi vhe na lutendo, dzula na nne Mutshidzi.

title: 132. Tsini Na Tshifhambano
content:
# 132. Tsini Na Tshifhambano

 1. Tsini na tshifhambano, hu re na mulambo,U bva ngei khalivari, u a tshidza vhothe.
CHORUSNgei tshifhambanoni, kha hu vhe na thendo,Ndi hune muya wanga wa awela hone.
2. Tsini na tshifhambano, ndo wana tshilidzi,naledzi ndi ya mutsho, ya mbo vhonetshela
3. Tsini na tshifhambano, Ngwana ya Mudzimu,Ndi tshi vho do dzumbana, nga murunzi wayo.
4. Tsini na tshifhambano, fulufhelo langa,Ndi vhuye ndi swike-vho, seli ha mulambo.

title: 133. Ndi Tshimbila Na Mudzimu
content:
# 133. Ndi Tshimbila Na Mudzimu

 1. Ndi tshimbila na Mudzimu, ndi fane-vho na Henoxe;U nkokodze-vho nga Tshanda, uri ndi vhuye ndilani;Musi ndi tshi vho do neta, kha ndi kokodzwe nga Iwe.
2. Ndi nga si kone ndi ndothe, zwa ralo ndi do balelwa;Zwikhukhuliso ndi zwinzhi, na maswina a tshi ntanga,Ho dala zwikhukhuliso, nthange phanda ndi tshimbile.
3. Musi ndo awela kha ’we, zwa shangoni a s tshithu;Ndi tshimbila ndo talifha, ndi do hwala tshifhambano,Ndi de ndi vhone Tsioni, Ida u tshimbile na nne.

title: 134. Lufuno Lu Mangadzaho
content:
# 134. Lufuno Lu Mangadzaho

 1. Muya wanga u a khoda, vhuhulu ha makoleni;Ndi nnyi a khodaho, a ambaho lufuno lwa lu na Yesu?
CHORUSLufuno lu mangadzaho, lufuno lwa Murena,Lu sa fheli, lwa Murena, lufuno lwa Murena.
2. Lu a ri linda vhusiku, lu a penya lu swiswini;Lufuno lwa Mudzimu, ndi mushonga une wa ilafha.
3. Ndi a fulufhela tshothe, ndi do thuswa-vho ndi tshi wa;Vhutshiloni na lufuni lufuno lwa Yesu lu hone.

title: 135. Ndi U Funa U Fhira Zwothe Khotsi
content:
# 135. Ndi U Funa U Fhira Zwothe Khotsi

 1. U fhirisa zwithu zwothe, ndi funa Murena;Ngauri u na mulalo, u sa do fhelaho.
CHORUSA huna a divhadzaho, lufuno lu ngafha;A huna a divhadzaho, uri lu a tanzwa.
2. Ndi di-sendedza kha Iwe, nga maduvha othe;Zwo naka u divha Iwe, wa dzothe dzithendo.
3. Mbilu yanga yo takala, nga maduvha othe;Arali ndi si na Iwe, zwothe ndi lifhedzi.
4. Mutshidzi wanga wavhudi, a hu tshe na munwe;Ndi tshimbila na Iwe, zwothe zwi a luga.

title: 136. Ndi Humbula Khalivari
content:
# 136. Ndi Humbula Khalivari

 1. Ndi ya hune a do nyisa, ndo fulufhela Ene-vho,Ndi humbula thama yanga,O faho kha tshifhambano.
CHORUSNdi Yesu a nndededzaho, vhusiku na masiari,Ene ndi shaka vhusiku, ndi humbula khalivari.
2. Ndi funa mulayo wawe, ndi kungwa nga tshanda tshawe,Lufuno lwawe lwa-vhudi, O mpfela khalivari.
3. A huna u tima-tima, ndi tshi ya ha Yesu wanga,Ndi fulufhela u vhona o mpfelaho khalivari.

title: 137. Mphe Yesu
content:
# 137. Mphe Yesu

 1. Dzhia shango u mphe Yesu, ngauri ndi lifhedzi;Zwi re khalo a si tshithu, Yesu Ene ha fheli.
CHORUSMphe tshilidzi tshau Yesu, vhuhulu ha lufuno;Na u rengululwa hanga, vhutshilo vhu sa fheli.
2. Shango a si tshithu kha nne, musi ndo wana Yesu;Ndi lindwa nga Mutshidzi, ndi imba lu difhesaho.
3. Shango a si tshithu kha nne, ndo sedza tshifhambano;Kha ndi vhone-ha Murena, ndo’ bonyoloswa tshothe.

title: 138. U di-nekedza tshothe
content:
# 138. U di-nekedza tshothe

 1. Vhutshilo hanga ngovhu, ndi kumedza Murena.Na zwanda ngezwi, zwi shumise Murena.
CHORUSNtanzwe malofhani a Ngwana (a Ngwana)Ndi tambe tshothe tshisimani (tshi tshidzaho)Ndi di-nekedza tshothe kha MurenaU swika vhufheloni
2. Milenzhe yanga ngei, I shumele Murena.Ipfi langa li imbe thendo dzau Murena.
3. Mulomo wanga ngoyu, u nule fhungo lau.Na zwothe zwi re zwanga, zwi vhe zwau Murena.
4. maduvha othe anga, ndi rende-vho Murena.Na mihumbulo yanga, i dededzwe nga Iwe.
5. Ndi ite lufuno lwau, ndi hangwe zwi re zwanga.Mbilu yanga nga i vhe yone khulunoni yau.

title: 139. Ndi I Wana Khonani
content:
# 139. Ndi I Wana Khonani

 1. Ndo i wana khonani yo mpfuna ndi sa divhi,O nkokodzela kha lufuno uri ndi tshidziwe.Mbilu yanga nga i vhofhiwe-vho nga Ene Yesu,Zwino nne ndi wawe nga hu sa fheliho.
2. Ndo no i wana khonani Ene we a fela nne,A nyitela mpho khulu nga hone vhutshilo hawe.Zwithu zwothe a si zwanga ndi zwa Ene munei,Arali zwino ndi kha nndwa ndi do di awela.
3. Ndo no i wana khonani Maanda othe ndi awe,Ndi do di ya tadulu nga yenei ndila mbuya.Ndi vhone lupenyo na uri ndi fhiwe Maanda,Arali zwino ndi kha nndwa ndi do di awela.
4. Ndo no wana khonani ya vhulenda na tshilidzi,Muphulusi wa vhutali mulisa a na Maanda.We a mpfuna zwavhudi ndi kha di shaya mini,Ri songo fhambanyiswa nga lufu ndi wau nne.

title: 140. Ipfi la Yesu
content:
# 140. Ipfi la Yesu

 1. Ipfi la Yesu li ri ’Ida-ha u awele.’O netaho a awele kha Ene, Murena,Ndi da kha Mutshidzi wanga, ndi a da ndo neta,Ndi do wana vhuawelo khae nda takala.
2. Ndo zwi pfa Yesu a tshi ri, ’Ndi do u nekedza,Madi a re na vhutshilo, u kone u tshila.’Nda da nda nwa madi ayo, nda vha a tshilaho,dora langa lo dzimulwa, ndi tshila kha Ene.
